preparationDE: Füge Eis in einen Shaker und gieße alle Zutaten ein. Rühren Sie mit einem Barlöffel 40 bis 45 Umdrehungen oder bis zur vollständigen Abkühlung. In ein Martini-Glas oder über Eis in ein Rocks Glas abseihen. Mit Orangenspirale garnieren.
preparationEN: Add ice to a shaker and pour in all ingredients. Using a bar spoon, stir 40 to 45 revolutions or until thoroughly chilled. Strain into a martini glass or over ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with orange twist.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in uno shaker con cubetti di ghiaccio.  Shakerare bene e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail fredda.  Spremi l'olio dalla scorza di limone sulla bevanda.

preparationEN: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Zitronen- und Limonenscheiben) mit Eis schütteln und in ein Whiskey Sour Glas abseihen. Mit den Zitronen- und Limonenscheiben dekorieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients (except slices of lemon and lime) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with the slices of lemon and lime and serve.
preparationIT: Aggiungi il ghiaccio in uno shaker e versa tutti gli ingredienti.  Usando un cucchiaio da bar, mescola da 40 a 45 giri o fino a quando non si sarà completamente raffreddato.  Filtrare in una coppetta Martini o con ghiaccio.  Guarnire con un tocco d'arancia.

preparationEN: Step 1  Pour rosé into a 13x9" pan and freeze until almost solid (it won't completely solidify due to the alcohol), at least 6 hours.    Step 2  Meanwhile, bring sugar and ½ cup water to a boil in a medium saucepan; cook, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves, about 3 minutes. Add strawberries, remove from heat, and let sit 30 minutes to infuse syrup with strawberry flavor. Strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a small bowl (do not press on solids); cover and chill until cold, about 30 minutes.    Step 3  Scrape rosé into a blender. Add lemon juice, 3½ ounces strawberry syrup, and 1 cup crushed ice and purée until smooth. Transfer blender jar to freezer and freeze until frosé is thickened (aim for milkshake consistency), 25–35 minutes.    Step 4  Blend again until frosé is slushy. Divide among glasses.    Step 5  Do Ahead: Rosé can be frozen 1 week ahead.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer der Kirsche) in einem Elektromixer für fünf Sekunden bei niedriger Geschwindigkeit, dann bei hoher Geschwindigkeit bis zum festen Stand mischen. Den Inhalt in ein Champagner Glas geben, mit der Kirsche verzieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients (except for the cherry) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for five seconds, then blend at a high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute, top with the cherry, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (tranne le fette di limone e lime) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere da whisky sour.Decorare con le fettine di limone e lime e servire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit 1 Tasse Crushed Ice in einem Elektromixer bei niedriger Geschwindigkeit für kurze Zeit mischen. In ein old-fashioned Glas geben und servieren.
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.
preparationIT: Unire tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la ciliegia) in un frullatore elettrico e frullare a bassa velocità per cinque secondi, quindi frullare ad alta velocità fino a quando non si rassoda.Versare il contenuto in una flûte da champagne, guarnire con la ciliegia e servire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit 1 Tasse Crushed Ice in einem Elektromixer bei niedriger Geschwindigkeit für kurze Zeit mischen. In ein Champagner Glas geben und servieren.
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.
preparationIT: Unisci tutti gli ingredienti con 1 tazza di ghiaccio tritato in un frullatore elettrico. Frullare a bassa velocità per un breve periodo di tempo.Versare in un bicchiere vecchio stile e servire.

preparationDE: Erdbeeren mit Zucker vermengen und im Kühlschrank über Nacht ruhen lassen. Zitrone schneiden, zwei Scheiben zurücklegen. Den Rest entsaften. Zitronensaft, Erdbeeren, Apfelsaft und Sodawasser mischen. Zitronenscheiben hinzufügen (nur Dekor). In Gläser, Eiswürfel und eine Apfelscheibe geben. Gießen Sie das Getränk hinein und servieren Sie es.
preparationEN: Toss strawberries with sugar, and let sit overnight in refrigerator. Cut lemon, reserve two slices. Juice the rest. Mix together the lemon juice, strawberries, apple juice, and soda water. Add slices of lemon (decor, really). In glasses, put ice cubes, and a slice of apple. Pour drink in, and serve.
preparationIT: Condite le fragole con lo zucchero e lasciate riposare per una notte in frigorifero. Taglia il limone e metti da parte due fette. Spremi il resto. Mescola il succo di limone, le fragole, il succo di mela e l'acqua gassata. Aggiungi le fette di limone (giusto per decorazione).Nei bicchieri mettere i cubetti di ghiaccio e una fetta di mela.Versa la bevanda e servi.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in den Mixer geben - abdecken und bei mittlerer Geschwindigkeit schaumig schlagen, bis sie gut vermischt sind. In ein großes, 2 mittlere oder 3 kleine Gläser füllen und geniessen.
preparationEN: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.
preparationIT: Mettere tutti gli ingredienti nella caraffa del frullatore - coprire e montare a velocità media fino a quando non sono ben amalgamati.Versare in un bicchiere alto, 2 medi o 3 piccoli e bere.

preparationDE: Bis zur geschmeidigen Konsistenz mischen.
preparationEN: Blend til smooth.
preparationIT: Frulla fino a ottenere un composto omogeneo.

preparationEN: Combine Luxardo, gin, apple water and citric acid solution into a shaker tin and shake to chill. Double strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a slice of Fuji apple lightly dusted with cinnamon.  *Apple Water: -- 1 Fuji Apple -- 2 c Water  Slice Fuji apple and combine with water. Vacuum seal and place in a sous-vide for 3-4 hrs at 130°F. Strain apples; water is ready for use.  **Citric Acid Solution: -- 1 ml gram Citric Acid -- 3 ml Water  Combine citric acid and water. Stir until dissolved.
Shaken and strained into a large coupe. Mint oil is house-made and used as a garnish.
Mix all ingredients together and strain into a Collins glass. Use Jamaican rum where possible for a more authentic taste.
preparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti insieme e filtrare in un bicchiere Collins. Usa rum giamaicano, ove possibile, per un gusto più autentico.

preparationDE: Füllen Sie die Kaffeetasse halb voll mit Kaffee. Füllen Sie die andere Hälfte mit Pfirsichschnaps. Umrühren und trinken, solange es heiß ist.
preparationEN: fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.
preparationIT: Versa in un bicchiere da cappuccino metà caffè.  Riempi l'altra metà di Schnapps alla pesca.  Mescola e bevi finché è caldo.

preparationDE: Gut schütteln und in einem Cocktailglas servieren. Dies ist ein Cocktail aus American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italien.
preparationEN: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.
preparationIT: Shakerare bene e servire in una coppetta da cocktail.Questo è un cocktail casalingo dell'American / Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italia.

notes: This sophisticated take on the classic Old Fashioned will impress cocktail purists, bourbon-lovers and experimental mixologists alike. Garrison Brothers Flagship Bourbon is as smooth a whiskey as they come, with rich flavors that unfold for a buttery, caramelized-sugar finish. When met with the sweet apricot liqueur and the bitterness from the muddled lemon peel and the aromatic bitters, you get a truly complex drink.
preparationEN: Place the lemon peel in an Old Fashioned glass and muddle with bitters. In a mixing glass filled with ice, add the bourbon and apricot liqueur, then strain into the glass. Garnish with cherry and orange slice, and serve over an ice sphere.

notes: Cocktail adapted from the "Pimm's Cup" cocktail, served at the Napoleon House, New Orleans.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled serving glass. Top with a splash of ginger ale. Garnish with a cucumber slice, quartered.
Muddle fruit, bitters and syrup. Add ice (1 large cube if available). Top with Whisky. Long stir.

preparationDE: Den Galliano-Likör über Eis gießen. Füllen Sie den Rest des Glases mit Ginger Ale und das ist alles, was dazu gehört. Du hast jetzt ein eigenes GG.
preparationEN: Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.
preparationIT: Versare il liquore Galliano su ghiaccio.  Riempi il resto del bicchiere con ginger ale e questo è tutto.  Ora hai il tuo GG personale.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einen Shaker geben und mit Eis füllen. Schütteln und in ein gekühltes Cocktailglas oder ein mit frischem Eis gefülltes Old Fashioned Glas abseihen. Mit einer Limettenscheibe garnieren.
preparationEN: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.    Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass or an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice.    Garnish with a lime wheel.
preparationIT: Aggiungere tutti gli ingredienti in uno shaker e riempire di ghiaccio, shakerare e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail ghiacciata o in un bicchiere riempito con ghiaccio fresco.

preparationDE: Puderzucker und 6 cl. kohlensäurehaltiges Wasser in einem Collins-Glas verrühren. Das Glas mit Eis füllen und Gin hinzufügen. Mit kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser auffüllen und umrühren. Fügen Sie die Zitronenschale und die Orangenspirale so hinzu, dass das Ende der Orangenspirale über den Glasrand baumelt.
preparationEN: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Add the lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.
preparationIT: Mescolare lo zucchero a velo 56g e acqua gassata in un bicchiere Collins. Riempi il bicchiere di ghiaccio e aggiungi il gin. Riempi con acqua gassata e mescola. Aggiungere la scorza di limone e la spirale di arancia in modo che l'estremità della spirale penda sul bordo del vetro.

preparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, Wein, Zitronensaft, Zucker und Grenadine vermengen. Gut schütteln. In ein old-fashioned Glas geben und mit der Kirsche und der Orangenscheibe garnieren.
preparationEN: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.
preparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire il vino, il succo di limone, lo zucchero e la granatina.Versare in un bicchiere vecchio stile e guarnire con la ciliegia e la fetta d'arancia.Agitare bene.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eiswürfel schütteln, außer Sodawasser. In das Glas gießen. Mit Sodawasser auffüllen.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con cubetti di ghiaccio, tranne l'acqua gassata. Versare nel bicchiere. Completare con acqua gassata.

preparationEN: Shake and strain up into cocktail glass.
Muddle pineapple and ginger root, lemon juice and simple syrup, then add Aperitivo and rum, shake well, over ice and top up with Ginger beer.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Build all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and stir. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with fresh fennel flowers.

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
preparationEN: Shake booze, juice and gum. Add bitters and salt to a double rocks glass then add ice. Strain cocktail, top with tonic. Garnish with bitter covered lemon peel.

preparationDE: Füllen Sie ein hohes Glas halb mit Eis. Gin und Grenadine vermischen und über das Eis gießen. Limetten- oder Zitronensaft hinzufügen und mit Sodawasser auffüllen. Das Glas mit Limetten- und/oder Zitronenscheiben dekorieren.
preparationEN: Half-fill a tall glass with ice. Mix the gin and Grenadine together and pour over the ice. Add the lime or lemon juice and top off with soda water. Decorate the glass with lime and/or lemon slices.
preparationIT: Riempi a metà un bicchiere alto di ghiaccio.  Mescolare il gin e la Grenadine e versare sul ghiaccio.  Aggiungere il succo di lime o limone e completare con acqua gassata.  Decorare il bicchiere con lime e / o fettine di limone.

preparationDE: Puderzucker in einer Mischung aus Wasser und Zitronensaft auflösen. Gin hinzufügen. In ein old-fashioned Glas über Eiswürfel gießen und umrühren. Die  Orangenspirale hinzufügen und servieren.
preparationEN: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.
preparationIT: Sciogliere lo zucchero a velo in una miscela di acqua e succo di limone. Aggiungi il gin. Versare in un bicchiere vecchio stile con dei cubetti di ghiaccio e mescolare.Aggiungere la scorza d'arancia e servire.

preparationDE: Den Zucker mit kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser und Minzzweigen in einem old-fashioned Glas vermengen. Gin und 1 Eiswürfel dazugeben. Umrühren, die Orangenscheibe und die Kirsche dazugeben und servieren.
preparationEN: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, add the orange slice and the cherry, and serve.
preparationIT: Pestare lo zucchero con acqua gassata e rametti di menta in un bicchiere vecchio stile.Aggiungi il gin e 1 cubetto di ghiaccio.Mescolate, aggiungete la fetta d'arancia e la ciliegia e servite.

preparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, Gin, Zitronensaft und Zucker mischen. Gut schütteln. In ein Sour Glas abseihen und mit der Orangenscheibe und der Kirsche garnieren.
preparationEN: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.
preparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unisci il gin, il succo di limone e lo zucchero.Filtrare in un bicchiere e guarnire con la fetta d'arancia e la ciliegia.Agitare bene.

preparationEN: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with the pineapple chunks and the strawberries and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare gin, granatina e zucchero a velo con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere highball su cubetti di ghiaccio. Riempi con acqua gassata e mescola. Decorare con i pezzi di ananas e le fragole e servire.

preparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, Limettensaft, Zucker, Gin und Bitter vermengen. Gut schütteln. Füllen Sie ein gekühltes Glas mit Eiswürfel. Rühren Sie, bis das Glas mattiert ist. Die Mischung im Shaker in das Glas abseihen und das Club-Soda hinzufügen.
preparationEN: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a colling glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the club soda.
preparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unisci il succo di lime, lo zucchero, il gin e il bitter, agitare bene. Riempi quasi a l'orlo un bicchiere Collins con dei cubetti di ghiaccio. Mescolare fino a quando il bicchiere è ghiacciato. Filtrare la miscela nello shaker e versala nel bicchiere, infine aggiungere la soda club.

preparationDE: Puderzucker und Wasser in einem old-fashioned Glas mischen. Gin und einen Eiswürfel dazugeben. Umrühren, Zitronenschale hinzufügen und servieren.
preparationEN: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, add the twist of lemon peel, and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare lo zucchero a velo e l'acqua in un bicchiere vecchio stile. Aggiungi il gin e un cubetto di ghiaccio. Mescolare, aggiungere la scorza di limone e servire.

preparationEN: Pour the first four ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve into a champagne saucer. Top with Pomegranate Liqueur float.

preparationDE: Zucker und Gewürze in Wasser kochen, 30 Minuten im Wasser ziehen lassen. Das gewürzte Wasser abgießen und mit dem Wein mischen. Langsam erhitzen, bis die Siedetemperatur erreicht ist. (Um Alkohol zu entfernen, lassen Sie ihn eine Weile kochen.) Sie können Zitronen- oder Orangensaft nach Belieben hinzufügen. In einer irischen Kaffeetasse servieren.
preparationEN: Boil sugar and spices in water, leave in the water for 30 minutes. Strain the spiced water and mix with the wine. Heat slowly until short of boiling temperature. (To remove alcohol, let it boil for a while.) You may add lemon or orange juice to taste. Serve in irish coffee cup.
preparationIT: Far bollire lo zucchero e le spezie in acqua, lasciare in acqua per 30 minuti.  Filtrate l'acqua speziata e mescolatela con il vino.  Riscaldare lentamente fino a raggiungere la temperatura di ebollizione.  (Per rimuovere l'alcol, lascialo bollire per un po '.) Puoi aggiungere succo di limone o arancia a piacere.  Servire in tazza di caffè irlandese.

preparationEN: In a collins glass, add ingredients beginning with orgeat and ending with rye. Fill glass half full with minted crushed ice. Begin "swizzling" cocktail with stick until cocktail is blended and ice forms on outside of glass. Top with more minted crushed ice and garnish with lemon and mint.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten gut mit gebrochenem Eis schütteln, in ein Sektglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare bene tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio tritato, filtrare in un flute da champagne e servire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten direkt in ein old-fashioned Glas mit Eiswürfeln geben. Vorsichtig umrühren.
preparationEN: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti direttamente nel bicchiere vecchio stile riempito di cubetti di ghiaccio. Mescola delicatamente.

preparationDE: Wodka und Amaretto in ein old-fashioned Glas über Eis gießen und servieren.
preparationEN: Pour vodka and amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.
preparationIT: Versare la vodka e l'amaretto in un bicchiere vecchio stile con ghiaccio e servire.

preparationDE: Mit gebrochenem Eis schütteln. In ein Glas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into glass and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare con ghiaccio tritato.  Filtrare nel bicchiere e servire.

preparationEN: Fill a collins or highball glass with cracked or cubed ice. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with cracked or cubed ice. Shake and strain into the glass.  *SC Demerara Syrup: -- 2 C Water -- 1 C Demerara Sugar -- 3 C Granulated Sugar  Bring water to boil in a saucepan over high heat. Add the demerara sugar and stir vigorously with a whisk (or use an immersion blender) until sugar is dissolved, about 1 minute (the water should become clear). Add granulated sugar and stir vigorously until dissolved, about 1 minute. Remove from heat and let cool.

Put basil leaves in mixing glass. Gently muddle the leaves. Add all ingredients except the bitters or ice. Dry shake the cocktail vigorously. Add the ice and shake again vigorously. Double strain into a coupe. Add a few drops of angostura on top, add cracked pepper, slap one single basil leaf on top for garnish.
Combine all ingredients in a glass filled with ice and garnish with an orange twist.
Strain into an ice filled glass and garnish with an orange twist.

preparationDE: In einem old-fashioned Glas servieren.
preparationEN: Serve in an old fashioned glass.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in un bicchiere, mescola bene.

preparationDE: Zutaten in einen Cocktailshaker mit Eis geben. Zügig schütteln und dann in ein gekühltes Cocktailglas abseihen.
preparationEN: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
preparationIT: Versare gli ingredienti in uno shaker con ghiaccio.  Agitare energicamente e poi filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail fredda.

preparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfel gefüllt ist, den Gin, die Triple Sec, Ananassaft und Grenadine miteinander vermengen. Gut schütteln. In ein old-fashioned Glas geben und mit der Ananasscheibe garnieren.
preparationEN: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, triple sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with the pineapple slice.
preparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unisci il gin, il triple sec, il succo d'ananas e la granatina, versare in un bicchiere vecchio stile e guarnire con la fetta di ananas. Agitare bene

preparationEN: Step one: Infuse the vodka - Transfer ingredients including 750 ml of Karlsson's vodka to a canning jar or glass container. Close the container. - Shake and rotate every few hours. Let infuse for 24 hours total. - After 24 hours, strain the vodka through a cheesecloth or nutmilk bag. - Transfer the vodka to a glass bottle. Store in the refrigerator or freezer until use.  Step two: Make the martini - Stir 2-3 oz, depending on preference, of the infused vodka with ice. - Strain into a chilled martini glass. - Add pickled onions and peppers.

preparationDE: Zuerst Apfelwein, dann Lager und Curacao.
preparationEN: Cider First, Lager then Curacao
preparationIT: Sidro prima, Lager poi Curacao

preparationEN: Shake, strain, up, garnish.

preparationDE: Den Wodka in ein mit Eis gefülltes Collins-Glas geben. Mit Grapefruitsaft übergießen und umrühren.
preparationEN: Add the vodka to a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with grapefruit juice and stir.
preparationIT: Versa la vodka in un bicchiere Collins pieno di ghiaccio, aggiungi il succo di pompelmo e mescola.

preparationDE: Kahlua und 151 in einem Glas mischen. Füge schnell Eis hinzu und gieße Grenadine über das Eis, um eine rötliche Farbe zu erhalten.
preparationEN: Mix Kahlua and 151 in glass. Quickly add ice and pour grenadine over ice to give ice red tint.
preparationIT: Mescola Kahlua e 151 nel bicchiere.  Aggiungi rapidamente il ghiaccio e versa la granatina sul ghiaccio per dare una sfumatura rosso ghiaccio.

preparationDE: Serviert über Eis. Klingt übel, schmeckt aber super.
preparationEN: Served over ice. Sounds nasty, but tastes great.
preparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti tranne il latte in un bicchiere con ghiaccio.  Completare con il latte.  Servire.

preparationEN: Fill a highball glass with ice, and build the syrup, lemon juice, and soda water. Stir, and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.

Tip the cherry juice, orange peel, chilli, cinnamon sticks, cloves and ginger into a large saucepan. Simmer for 5 mins, then turn off the heat. Leave to cool, then chill for at least 4 hrs, or up to 2 days – the longer you leave it the more intense the flavours. If serving to young children, take the chilli out after a few hours.    When you’re ready to serve, pour the juice into a jug. Serve in glass bottles or glasses and pop a straw in each. If you're adding vodka, do so at this stage. Dangle a fangs sweet from each glass.
preparationIT: Versare il succo di ciliegia, la buccia d'arancia, il peperoncino, i bastoncini di cannella, i chiodi di garofano e lo zenzero in una grande casseruola. Cuocere a fuoco lento per 5 minuti, quindi spegnere il fuoco. Raffreddare per almeno 4 ore o fino a 2 giorni: più a lungo lo lasci, più intensi sono i sapori. Se servi ai bambini piccoli, togli il peperoncino dopo alcune ore.    Quando sei pronto per servire, versa il succo in una caraffa. Servire in bottiglie o bicchieri di vetro e inserire una cannuccia in ciascuno. Se stai aggiungendo la vodka, fallo in questa fase. Fai ciondolare una zanna dolce da ogni bicchiere.

preparationEN: Shake ingredients with ice then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Fill a 10-oz mug with boiling water. When the mug is hot, pour out the water and add the amaretto and cider. Top with a layer of cream. Grate fresh cinnamon on top as a garnish.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Add all ingredients in a cocktail shaker, shake, fine strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass. Garnish with edible flower.  *Jasmine Tea/Rice-Infused Junipero Gin: -- 1 bottle (750ml) Junípero gin -- .5 cup Jasmine Tea -- .5 cup Jasmine Rice (wash rice to eliminate starch)  Sous Vide Version: Wash the jasmine rice to clean out the starch. Fill container with hot water. Set sous vide at 52c. Add vacuum seal bag with jasmine tea/rice in bath. Let sit in bath for 45 minutes. Take the bag out of bath and sit it in ice bath for 15 minutes. Open bag and fine strain back into bottle.  Infusion Version: Wash the jasmine rice to clean out the starch. In a cambro/mason jar, add Junípero gin and jasmine tea and rice. Let infuse for 24 hours. Fine strain into bottle.  **House-made Honey Syrup:   Put equal parts of honey (10 oz) and water (10 oz) in a saucepan. Boil, then turn down to a simmer and stir until the honey is completely dissolved.

preparationDE: Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum über Eis in ein mit Eis gefüllten Glas giessen und mit Ginger Ale auffüllen. Mit Limette garnieren. Schmeckt wie ein Sahnesoda. Benannt nach der Referenz auf die Gilligan's Island ("The Captain" *in* "Ginger" ist ein glücklicher Skipper!)
preparationEN: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over ice, fill glass to top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with lime. Tastes like a cream soda. Named for the Gilligan's Island reference ("The Captain" *in* "Ginger" is a Happy Skipper!)
preparationIT: Versare il rum speziato di Captain Morgan sul ghiaccio, riempire il bicchiere con Ginger Ale. Guarnire con il lime. Chiamato per il riferimento a Gilligan's Island ("Il capitano" * in * "Ginger" è uno skipper felice!)

preparationEN: Pour all liquid ingredients into a mixing glass and stir about 55 times for proper dilution and optimal clarity. Strain into a chilled coupe. Twist fresh lemon peel over cocktail for aroma. Garnish with a simple lemon peel, trimmed neatly.

preparationDE: Wodka und Orangensaft mit Eis im Glas verrühren, dann den Galliano darauf verteilen. Garnieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare la vodka e il succo d'arancia con ghiaccio nel bicchiere, successivamente versa nel drink il Galliano. Guarnire e servire.

preparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfel gefüllt ist, alle Zutaten vermengen. Gut schütteln. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
preparationEN: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
preparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire tutti gli ingredienti.Agitare bene.Filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationDE: Den Whisky und die Baileys Cream in einem Bierglas (mind. 50 cl) mischen. Füllen Sie den Rest des Glases mit Kaffee.
preparationEN: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.
preparationIT: Mescolare il whisky e la crema di Baileys in un bicchiere da birra (almeno 50 cl).  Riempi il resto del bicchiere di caffè.

preparationEN: Combine all ingredients and stir. Pour the mixture into a chilled Nick & Nora glass and garnish with the orange zest.
Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir to chill and dilute. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Express the oil from the twist over the drink and discard.
Shake with ice in a mixing tin and double strain into a chilled cocktail coupe. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einen Shaker mit Eis geben. Schütteln.
preparationEN: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in uno shaker con ghiaccio.  Agita.

preparationDE: Gießen Sie Hot Damn 100 auf den Boden eines normalen Glases. Füllen Sie den Rest des Glases mit süßem Tee. Mit einem Löffel, Strohhalm oder besser noch einer Zimtstange umrühren und darin belassen.
preparationEN: Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.
preparationIT: Versa Hot Damn 100 sul fondo di un barattolo o di un bicchiere normale.  Riempi il resto del bicchiere con tè dolce.  Mescola con un cucchiaio, una cannuccia o, meglio ancora, una stecca di cannella e lasciala dentro.

preparationEN: Dry shake, add ice and shake again. Strain into a coupe glass.

notes: Japanese riff on a Left Hand cocktail
preparationEN: Chilled. Serve up or on the rocks.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Oliven) mit Eis verrühren und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Die Olive dazugeben und servieren.
preparationEN: Stir all ingredients (except olive) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the olive and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti (eccetto l'oliva) con ghiaccio e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail.Aggiungere l'oliva e servire.

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
preparationEN: Shake, fine strain into chilled coupe. Garnish with lime wheel.
Shake. Serve up. Garnish with lemon peel/pineapple.

preparationDE: Nimm viel Traubensaft und kohlensäurehaltige Flüssigkeiten (Club-Soda, Ginger Ale, Zitronenlimonade, was auch immer). In einer Bowle mischen. Nehmen Sie Orangenbrause und Limettenbrause. Bläschen im Punsch schweben lassen, sie ein wenig zergehen lassen, so dass sich ein böser Film über die Oberseite des Punschs verteilt, aber es gibt immer noch "Blasen" in Form von Brause-Schälchen darin. Sieht schrecklich aus, schmeckt gut.
preparationEN: Take a bunch of grape juice and a bunch of fizzy stuff (club soda, ginger ale, lemonlime, whatever). Mix them in a punch bowl. Take orange sherbet and lime sherbet. Scoop out scoops and float them in the punch, let them melt a little so that a nasty film spreads all over the top of the punch but there are still "bubbles" in it in the form of sherbet scoops. Looks horrible, tastes just fine.
preparationIT: Prendi un mazzetto di succo d'uva e un po 'di roba frizzante (club soda, ginger ale, sprite, qualunque cosa).  Mescolali in una ciotola da punch.  Prendi il sorbetto all'arancia e il sorbetto al lime.  Estrarre le palette e farle galleggiare nel punch, lasciarle sciogliere un po 'in modo che una pellicola sgradevole si diffonda su tutta la parte superiore del punch ma ci siano ancora delle "bolle" sotto forma di palline di sorbetto.  Sembra orribile, ha un buon sapore.

preparationDE: Zucker in 2 Tassen kochendem Wasser auflösen und Maissirup hinzufügen. Lösen Sie den Instantkaffee in dem verbleibenden Wasser auf. Geben Sie Sirup und Kaffee in eine Kanne. Abkühlen lassen. Fügen Sie Wodka und Vanille hinzu, wenn sie kalt sind. Für das beste Ergebnis lassen Sie die Mischung 4-5 Wochen "reifen".
preparationEN: Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture "mature" for 4-5 weeks.
preparationIT: Sciogliere lo zucchero in 2 tazze di acqua bollente e aggiungere lo sciroppo di mais.  Sciogliere il caffè solubile nell'acqua rimasta.  Versare lo sciroppo e il caffè in una brocca da un gallone.  Lascialo raffreddare.  Aggiungere la vodka e la vaniglia quando sono fredde.  Per il miglior risultato lasciare "maturare" la miscela per 4-5 settimane.

preparationEN: In collins glass, gently muddle honey, lime and basil leaves. Add English Harbour rum and ice and stir. Top with ginger ale.
Shake ingredients with crushed ice
preparationIT: Shakerare gli ingredienti con ghiaccio tritato

preparationEN: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an olive.
Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and stir until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled bucket glass over a large ice cube and garnish with a dukes lemon and dukes grapefruit zest.
Combine all ingredients in a chilled mixing glass, rimmed with sea salt and stir. Add ice. Stir again to mix. Garnish with a cocktail shrimp, lemon zest, fresh ground pepper and a celery stalk.
Combine Hophead Vodka, Kings Ginger, and lime juice in a Collins glass and fill with ice. Top with ginger beer. Stir. Garnish with a lime wheel.

preparationDE: Gießen Sie Brandy und Ginger Ale direkt in das Highball-Glas mit Eiswürfeln. Vorsichtig umrühren. Mit Zitronenschale garnieren. Auf Wunsch können Sie auch Spritzer von Angostura Bitter hinzufügen.
preparationEN: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.
preparationIT: Versare brandy e ginger ale direttamente in un bicchiere highball con cubetti di ghiaccio.  Mescola delicatamente.  Guarnire con la scorza di limone.  Se lo desideri, aggiungi un pizzico di Angostura Bitter.

preparationEN: Garnished with orange peel and star anise. Served over the rocks in a stemless wine glass.  *7-Spice Syrup: -- Pink Peppercorn -- Star Anise -- Sumac -- Cinnamon -- Nutmeg -- Coriander -- Cardamom

Genevieve is Hotaling's interpretation of genever, an ancient and mysterious gin style. The most common way to consume genever has always been straight. If you are planning to set sail for the day, picnic or do something else to enjoy the great outdoors, we recommend throwing a bottle of Genevieve in the freezer the evening before your outing and moving it to the cooler day of. We sip it straight while enjoying a lager. Glassware is dealer's choice, but cordial glasses are elegant and fun.
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and stir with ice. Strain and serve up with an orange twist.

preparationDE: Schokolade, Butter und Vanille in einem Doppelkocher schmelzen. Wenn es glatt ist, die Sahne unterrühren.
preparationEN: Melt the chocolate, butter and vanilla in a double boiler. When just smooth stir in the cream.
preparationIT: Sciogliere il cioccolato, il burro e la vaniglia a bagnomaria.Quando risulterà liscio aggiungere la panna.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einem Glas vermengen.
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in glass
preparationIT: Unisci tutti gli ingredienti in un bicchiere

preparationEN: STEP 1  Whisk the whisky and honey together and split between 2 heatproof glasses. Add half of the cinnamon stick to each, then top up with 200ml boiling water.    STEP 2  Add a splash of lemon juice to each, then taste and add more to your preference. Finish each with a slice of lemon, studded with a clove, and serve immediately.
preparationIT: PASSO 1  Sbatti il whisky e il miele insieme e dividi in 2 bicchieri. Aggiungere metà della stecca di cannella a ciascuna, quindi rabboccare con 200 ml di acqua bollente.    PASSO 2  Aggiungi una spruzzata di succo di limone a ciascuno, quindi assaggia e aggiungi altro a tua preferenza. Terminate ciascuna con una fetta di limone, guarnire con uno spicchio, e servite subito.

preparationDE: Den Bombay Saphir, Martini Bianco, Zuckersirup & Brombeeren in einen Cocktailshaker mit viel Eis geben und kräftig schütteln, bevor man sie in ein Ballonglas gießt, mit Limonade auffüllt und mit einem Stück Orange garniert.
preparationEN: Put the Bombay Sapphire, Martini Bianco, sugar syrup & blackberries in a cocktail shaker with lots of ice and shake vigorously before pouring into a balloon glass, topping up with lemonade and garnishing with a wedge of orange.
preparationIT: Mettere il Bombay Sapphire, il Martini Bianco, lo sciroppo di zucchero e le more in uno shaker con molto ghiaccio e agitare energicamente prima di versare in un bicchiere a palloncino, rabboccare con limonata e guarnire con uno spicchio di arancia.

preparationEN: Soak brown sugar cube in Angostura and Orange bitters. Muddle soaked sugar cube into a paste in a rocks glass. Pour 2 oz. Pink Pigeon. Add ice and stir. Garnish with an orange peel and Luxardo Cherry.

preparationDE: Zusammenmischen, bis Kaffee und Zucker aufgelöst sind. Milch zugeben. Gut schütteln. Die Verwendung eines Mixers oder Milchshakemachers ergibt es ein sehr schaumiges Getränk. In einer Kaffeetasse servieren.
preparationEN: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink. Serve in coffee mug.
preparationIT: Mescolare fino a quando il caffè e lo zucchero si saranno sciolti. Aggiungi il latte. Agitare bene. L'uso di un frullatore o di un frullato produce una bevanda molto schiumosa. Servito in tazza da caffè.

preparationDE: In einer Kaffeetasse vermischen und vor dem Servieren kalt stellen.
preparationEN: Mix together in a coffee mug and chill before serving.
preparationIT: Mescolare insieme in una tazza da caffè e raffreddare prima di servire.

preparationDE: Wodka in ein Glas geben und mit Eistee füllen. Nach Belieben Zitrone unterrühren.
preparationEN: Put Vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.
preparationIT: Metti la vodka in un bicchiere con del tè freddo.  Mescolare il limone a piacere.

drinkName: I'm Only Happy when it Rains
preparationEN: Shake, double strain into a Burgundy Glass.

preparationDE: Mit Eis schütteln und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
preparationEN: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass.
preparationIT: Shakerare con ghiaccio e filtrare nella coppetta da cocktail.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser) mit Eis schütteln und über zwei Eiswürfel in ein Highball-Glas abseihen. Mit kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser auffüllen, umrühren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (eccetto l'acqua gassata) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere highball su due cubetti di ghiaccio. Riempi con acqua gassata, mescola e servi.

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
preparationEN: Stir to 35 °F, strain into a double rocks glass over an angled ice wedge. Garnish with orange peel.

notes: *Old Fashioned riff
preparationEN: Stir and strain into a chilled coupe.

notes: Aged for 3 months in a used Rye Barrel that previously held a cocktail with Tequila and All Spice. Can also be made to order without barrel aging it.
preparationEN: Stir and strain into an old fashioned glass. Large ice cube.

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
preparationEN: Stir, fine strain into a collins glass over ice. Top with soda. Garnish with grapefruit peel.

preparationDE: Eine halbe Limette in Stücke schneiden, in einen Shaker geben, Zucker hinzufügen und zerdrücken. Passionsfruchtsaft abmessen, in den Shaker geben und mit Eiswürfeln auffüllen. Schließen Sie den Shaker und schütteln Sie ihn kräftig. Die Flüssigkeit in ein Glas gießen, mit Ginger Ale auffüllen, mit einem Teelöffel umrühren und dann den Rand des Glases mit einer Scheibe Limette garnieren.
preparationEN: Cut half a lime into pieces, place in a shaker, add the sugar and crush. Measure the passion fruit juice, add it to the shaker and fill up with ice cubes. Close the shaker and shake vigorously. Pour the liquid into a glass, top up with ginger ale, stir with a teaspoon and then garnish the rim of the glass with a slice of lime
preparationIT: Tagliare a pezzi mezzo lime, metterlo in uno shaker, aggiungere lo zucchero e schiacciare.  Misurate il succo di frutto della passione, aggiungetelo allo shaker e riempitelo con cubetti di ghiaccio.  Chiudi lo shaker e agita energicamente.  Versare il liquido in un bicchiere, rabboccare con ginger ale, mescolare con un cucchiaino e poi guarnire il bordo del bicchiere con una fetta di lime

preparationEN: Add all ingredients except beer into shaker tin, shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Add beer in shaker tin then double strain into tin cup. Add mint for garish.

preparationDE: Kaffee, Whiskey und Zucker erhitzen; nicht kochen lassen. In ein Glas geben und mit Sahne übergießen; heiß servieren.
preparationEN: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.
preparationIT: Riscaldare il caffè, il whisky e lo zucchero; non bollire. Versare nel bicchiere e ricoprire con la panna; servito caldo.

preparationDE: Halb Scotch und halb Milch mischen. Rest hinzufügen.
preparationEN: Mix scotch and milk. Add half-and-half. Add rest.
preparationIT: Mescola tutti gli ingredienti in un frullatore fino a ottenere un composto omogeneo.  Da tenere in frigorifero. Servire con ghiaccio o miscelato in cocktail, agitando prima di ogni utilizzo

preparationDE: Geben Sie Irish Cream, Wodka und Bourbon in ein Glas. Etwas Eis dazugeben und den Orangensaft unterrühren.
preparationEN: Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.
preparationIT: Versare Irish Cream, Vodka e Bourbon in un bicchiere.  Aggiungere un po’ di ghiaccio e mescolare il succo d'arancia.

notes: *this drink was served at Portland Cocktail Week 2013
preparationEN: Combine the coffee and whiskey in a preheated cup. Top with Irish cream and pour the absinthe over the back of a spoon to float. Garnish.

preparationDE: Fügen Sie die Zutaten gemäß der im Rezept angegebenen Reihenfolge hinzu. Beim Hinzufügen des Guinness ist Vorsicht geboten, um einen Schaumüberschuss zu vermeiden. Füge kein Eis hinzu.
preparationEN: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the Guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do Not add ice.
preparationIT: Aggiungere gli ingredienti nell'ordine indicato  Bisogna fare attenzione quando si aggiunge la Guinness per evitare un eccesso di schiuma.  Non aggiungere ghiaccio.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Orangenscheibe und Kirsche) in ein Collins-Glas über Eiswürfel gießen. Mit der Orangenscheibe garnieren, die Kirsche darüber geben und servieren.
preparationEN: Pour all ingredients (except orange slice and cherry) into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the slice of orange, add the cherry on top, and serve.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la fetta d'arancia e la ciliegia) in un bicchiere Collins con cubetti di ghiaccio. Guarnire con la fetta d'arancia, aggiungere la ciliegina sulla torta e servire.

drinkName: Iron Fist in a Velvet Glove
preparationEN: Stir with ice and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
preparationEN: Shake, strain into a chilled coupe, float tonic water.
Shaken and served over ice.
Shake & Dump into Collins Glass, Top with Prosecco, cap with crushed ice. Garnish with Mint Sprig.

Combine all ingredients, add ice, and shake. Double strain into an old fashioned glass and add fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice (1/4 wheel) and Luxardo Cherry (both speared).  *0.25 - 0.50 oz Cane Sugar Syrup (to taste to allow variations in citrus flavor when batching)

preparationDE: Servieren Sie über Eis. Warnung, tödlich!
preparationEN: Serve over ice- Warning,Deadly!
preparationIT: Servire con ghiaccio - Attenzione, mortale!

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationDE: Nach dem Einfüllen der Zutaten und dem Hinzufügen von 3-5 Eiswürfeln je nach Geschmack, rühren Sie das Getränk mit einem Rührer um, um die Vanille vom Boden zu lösen.
preparationEN: After pouring in your ingredients, and adding 3-5 ice cubes, according to taste. Stir the drink with a stirrer to get the Vanilla off the bottom.
preparationIT: Dopo aver versato gli ingredienti e aver aggiunto 3-5 cubetti di ghiaccio, a piacere.  Mescola la bevanda con un agitatore per eliminare la vaniglia dal fondo.

preparationEN: dryshake/shake/dblrocks  garnish jalapeño slice

preparationDE: Füllen Sie einen Becher mit Eiswürfeln. Füge einen Schuss Tia Maria und einen Schuss jamaikanischen leichten Rum hinzu. Füllen Sie den Becher mit Milch. Mischen, bis sie glatt sind und sofort servieren.
preparationEN: Fill a tumbler with ice cubes. Add a shot of Tia Maria and a shot of Jamaican light rum. Fill the tumbler with milk. Blend until smooth and serve immediately.
preparationIT: Riempi un bicchiere con cubetti di ghiaccio.  Aggiungi un bicchierino di Tia Maria e un bicchierino di rum chiaro giamaicano.  Riempi il bicchiere di latte.  Frulla fino a ottenere un composto omogeneo e servi immediatamente.

preparationDE: Rum, Kaffee und Wasser miteinander verrühren. Mit der geschlagenen Sahne bedecken. Mit einer Prise gut gemahlenem Kaffee bestreuen und mit einem Strohhalm trinken.
preparationEN: Stir the rum, coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.
preparationIT: Mescola rum, caffè e acqua insieme.  Completare con la panna montata.  Cospargere con un pizzico di caffè ben macinato e bere con una cannuccia.

notes: *1:1 sugar (raw) to water, macerating a handful of basil flowers and two handfuls of dried jamaica flowers to each 2L of water.
preparationEN: Flash shake, strain onto fresh ice, top with Mexican Squirt. Salted starfruit garnish.

preparationDE: Den Rand eines Schnapsglases mit Zucker und Zuckersirup bestreichen. Geben Sie den Chambord Himbeerlikör in das Schnapsglas und geben Sie die Baileys Irish Cream vorsichtig darüber. Servieren.
preparationEN: Coat the rim of a shot glass with sugar using sugar syrup to stick. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur to the shot glass, and carefully layer the Baileys Irish Cream on top. Serve.
preparationIT: Rivestire il bordo di un bicchierino di zucchero con lo sciroppo di zucchero per attaccare.  Aggiungere il liquore al lampone di Chambord nel bicchierino e sovrapporre con cura la crema irlandese Baileys.

preparationEN: Combine all ingredients and shake thoroughly without ice for several minutes. Add ice, shake, and strain into a tall collins glass. Top with soda and garnish with an orange wheel.

notes: Photo credit: seriouseats.com
preparationEN: Fill a mixing glass half full with ice. Add cognac, orgeat, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over the drink and drop in as a garnish.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser) mit Eis schütteln und über zwei Eiswürfel in ein Highball-Glas abseihen. Mit kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser auffüllen, umrühren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (eccetto l'acqua gassata) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere highball su due cubetti di ghiaccio. Riempi con acqua gassata, mescola e servi.

preparationEN: Muddle two cucumber slices, two raspberries and simple syrup in a highball, add ice. Shake gin, ginger liqueur and orange juice with ice. Strain into highball glass.  Garnish with a candied ginger stick.

preparationDE: Kochen Sie 3 Tassen Wasser und fügen Sie dann Jello hinzu. Jello und Wasser mischen, bis Jello vollständig aufgelöst ist. Fügen Sie die beiden Tassen Wodka hinzu und mischen Sie sie zusammen. Die Mischung in Kunststoff-Schnapsgläser füllen und kühl stellen. Dann iss es weg.....
preparationEN: Boil 3 cups of water then add jello. Mix jello and water until jello is completely disolved. Add the two cups of vodka and mix together. Pour mixture into plastic shot glasses and chill until firm. Then, eat away...
preparationIT: Fai bollire 3 tazze d'acqua e aggiungi la gelatina.  Mescolare la gelatina e l'acqua fino a quando la gelatina è completamente sciolta.  Aggiungere le due tazze di vodka e mescolale.  Versare il composto in bicchierini di plastica e raffreddare fino a quando non si rassoda.

preparationDE: zu gleichen Teilen in Ponyglas mischen - schmeckt wie eine Jelly Bean!
preparationEN: mix equal parts in pony glass-tastes just like a jelly bean!
preparationIT: Mescola parti uguali in un bicchiere, gusta proprio come una gelatina!

preparationDE: In einem Mischglas, das halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, alle Zutaten vermengen. Gut umrühren. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
preparationEN: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
preparationIT: In un mixing glass riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire tutti gli ingredienti. Filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail. Mescolare bene.

preparationDE: Feuchtes Glas, Tauchrand in Zucker. Dann fügen Sie Eis hinzu. Dann füge alles andere hinzu. So einfach ist das!
preparationEN: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!
preparationIT: Bagna il biicchiere, immergere il bordo nello zucchero.  Quindi aggiungi ghiaccio.  Quindi aggiungi tutto il resto.  È così semplice!

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten direkt in ein mit Eis gefülltes Highball-Glas gießen. Vorsichtig umrühren. Garnieren. Füge einen Schuss Angostura-Bitter hinzu.
preparationEN: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti direttamente nel bicchiere highball pieno di ghiaccio.Aggiungi un pizzico di Angostura bitter.Mescola delicatamente.

notes: *Add umbrella toothpick for a fun look.

preparationEN: Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake with ice, then double strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a celery leaf.

Place ice cubes in a rocks glass. Add ingredients. Garnish with your choice of: rosemary, basil, lavender, edible flowers, or a lemon, lime or orange twist.  *Tonic Water Ice Cubes: Fill an ice cube tray with tonic water and freeze.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients. Serve over crushed ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a sage leaf.  *Substitute with Perfect Puree Green Apple flavor

notes: Photo credit: Lizzie Munro
preparationEN: In mixing glass, using a spoon, crush 2 mint leaves in the simple syrup, and add gin, lime juice and pomegranate syrup. Pour into ice-filled shaker. Shake well and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Float remaining 2 mint leaves for garnish.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in den Mixer geben - abdecken und bei mittlerer Geschwindigkeit schaumig schlagen, bis sie gut vermischt sind. In ein großes, 2 mittlere oder 3 kleine Gläser füllen und geniessen.
preparationEN: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.
preparationIT: Mettere tutti gli ingredienti nella caraffa del frullatore - coprire e montare a velocità media fino a quando non sono ben amalgamati.Versare in un bicchiere alto, 2 medi o 3 piccoli e bere.

preparationEN: Shaken without ice, then with ice and strained into a large coupe. Garnished with candied thyme.  *Beet Thyme Reduction -- 520 grams raw beets  -- 344 grams honey -- 2 oranges peeled (just the peels) -- 2 sprigs of thyme -- pinch of salt  Juice beets, add honey and let dissolve and cook for 15 mins.  Add thyme and simmer for 5 more mins.  Strain through a chinois into a container and then place in the fridge. This makes 1 quart, so multiply as needed. Use within 1 week.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten zusammen mit Eis schütteln. In ein Glas abseihen, garnieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti insieme al ghiaccio.Filtrare nel bicchiere, guarnire e servire.

preparationEN: Stir all ingredients until well chilled, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel with oils squeeze over cocktail.

notes: Coffee-Infused Karlsson's Gold Vodka (yield- 750 ml.):  Ingredients & Equipment - 1 750 ml. Bottle Karlsson's Gold vodka - .75 c. Coffee beans - French press - Coffee grinder  Instructions Grind the coffee beans and add them to the French press. Pour in the vodka and press. Let steep at room temperature for 12-24 hours. Strain out the coffee grounds and store in a sealed container in the refrigerator.  ---  *Cardamom Syrup (yield- 1 pt.):  Ingredients - .5 c. Whole green cardamom pods - 1 lb. Granulated sugar - 2 c. Water  Instructions In a 1 qt. saucepot bring the water and sugar to a boil. Once boiling add the cardamom pods and remove from the heat. Let steep 30 minutes and strain the cardamom pods out using a fine mesh sieve. Store in a covered container in the refrigerator. It should keep for a while in the fridge.  ---  **Coffee Soy Milk (yield- 1 c.):  Ingredients - 8 oz. Soy mik - 1 oz. Simple syrup - 2 Tbsp. Espresso powder  Instructions Blend the two ingredients until the espresso powder is completely dissolved.
preparationEN: In a Boston shaker combine all liquid ingredients (not the foam) with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Double strain the cocktail into an espresso cup. Using an aero-latte frothing whip froth the coffee infused soy milk and spoon the froth over the cocktail. Sprinkle with a little espresso powder.
Add vodka and lime juice to drinking glass, add ice, and top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime.

Put a brown sugar cube at the bottom of a frosted glass. Add a splash of bitter and muddle the sugar. Add Karlsson's Gold Vodka and stir with ice. Add lemon and orange peels (which you can burn for added flavor).

notes: With the winter months upon us, you are sure to find a need for a great punch recipe. Punches are very versatile and always a hit at parties. This punch can be served chilled or warm, depending on your taste. If served chilled, we recommend having a bottle of champagne on ice next to the punch bowl to offer your guests the option of topping their punch off with a bit of bubbles.
preparationEN: Toast spices and set aside. Bring cranberry juice to a simmer. Tie the spices and orange peel in cheesecloth and add them to the cranberry juice. Let this simmer for about 30 minutes. Remove the spice sachet and add the other liquid ingredients. Serve warm or chilled with orange wheels as a garnish. (The magic of punches is that you can adjust them to your liking as you make them, so please play around with different juices and proportions.)

preparationDE: Legen Sie eine Kupfermünze in eine Kaffeetasse und füllen Sie sie mit Kaffee, bis Sie die Münze nicht mehr sehen, dann fügen Sie Alkohol hinzu, bis Sie die Münze wieder sehen. Norwegische Spezialität.
preparationEN: Put a copper coin in a coffe-cup and fill up with coffee until you no longer see the coin, then add alcohol until you see the coin. Norwegian speciality.
preparationIT: Metti una moneta di rame in una tazza da caffè e riempila di caffè finché non vedi più la moneta, quindi aggiungi l'alcol finché non vedi la moneta. Specialità norvegese.

preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino cherry.

preparationDE: Den Bourbon und den Benediktiner in ein Brandyglas geben.
preparationEN: Pour the bourbon and Benedictine into a brandy snifter.
preparationIT: Versare il bourbon e il benedettino in un bicchierino di brandy.

preparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, den Bourbon und den Benediktiner vermengen. Schütteln und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Mit der Zitronenscheibe garnieren.
preparationEN: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the courbon and Benedictine. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.
preparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio unire il courbon e il benedettino.Shakerare e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail. Guarnire con la scorza di limone.

notes: *Strawberry, Black Pepper Balsamic Shrub 1.5 cups strawberries 0.5 cups sugar 2 tsp black peppercorns 0.25 cups balsamic vinegar 0.25 cups champagne vinegar  Combine all ingredients except vinegar in a container and let sit overnight at room temperature. The sugar should be absorbed by the strawberry juice. The next day, puree with a blender and add any additional vinegar to taste. Strain the shrub through chinois to remove any large leftover chunks. Label and date and keep in the fridge.
preparationEN: Build in a mixing glass and add ice. Slowly pour back and forth between two tins, about 4-6 times. Then dump the whole cocktail into a Fizz or Collins glass.
Pour the ingredients in an old fashioned glass, then fill up with ice and stir well before serving.
Shake, strain over crushed ice in a highball. Garnish with a mint sprig and a cherry.
Build and serve in a champagne flute.

preparationDE: Ingwer und Zitrone entsaften und in heißes Wasser geben. Du kannst Cardomom hinzufügen.
preparationEN: Juice ginger and lemon and add it to hot water. You may add cardomom.
preparationIT: Spremere lo zenzero e il limone e aggiungerlo all'acqua calda.Puoi aggiungere il cardamomo.

preparationEN: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into Canadian Glencairn glass.

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
preparationEN: Shake, strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with lemon twist.

Combine vodka, ginger liqueur, lemon juice, ginger-cinnamon syrup and bitters in tins with ice and shake. Double strain into collins glass over fresh ice and top with club soda.  *Ginger-Cinnamon Syrup:  Equal parts demerara sugar, clover honey, fresh ginger juice, water. Combine demerara sugar and clover honey and top with boiling water. Stir to dissolve. Once cooled add fresh ginger juice and stir to mix.

drinkName: King's Snap the Chocolate Out of You
preparationEN: Add all ingredients except the whip cream and ginger snap. Shake and double into a rocks glass with no ice. Top with marshmallow whip cream. Garnish with Ginger snap crumbles.
Combine ingredients into a hot mug, top with hot water and garnish with a rough orange twist.

preparationDE: Rühren. Die geschlagene Sahne dazugeben.
preparationEN: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti nel bicchiere. Aggiungere la panna montata in cima. Agitare.

preparationDE: Gib die Creme de Cassis auf den Boden des Glases und füge dann Wein hinzu.
preparationEN: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.
preparationIT: Aggiungere la crème de cassis sul fondo del bicchiere, quindi rabboccare con il vino.

preparationDE: Creme de Cassis in ein Glas geben, vorsichtig Champagner darüber gießen.
preparationEN: Pour Creme de cassis in glass, gently pour champagne on top
preparationIT: Versare la Creme de cassis nel bicchiere, versai sopra delicatamente lo champagne

notes: Photo credit: liquor.com
preparationEN: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an apple slice.

preparationDE: Im Glas mischen.
preparationEN: mix in the glass
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in un bicchiere, mescola bene.

notes: *After-dinner cocktail
preparationEN: Pre-mix the liquors together and keep refrigerated. Serve 2 oz. neat into a small coupe glass. Float the fresh cream on top.

preparationDE: Im Highball-Glas untermischen. Rühren. Mit einer Scheibe Kiwi garnieren.
preparationEN: Mix in highball glass. Stirr. Garnish with slice of kiwi.
preparationIT: Mescolare in un bicchiere highball.  Agitare.  Guarnire con una fetta di kiwi.

preparationDE: Alles in einen Mixer geben und aufschlagen.
preparationEN: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.
preparationIT: Getta tutto in un frullatore e liquida.

preparationEN: Shake and strain into small cocktail glass.

preparationDE: In ein großes Glas mit Eis gießen und umrühren. Nach Belieben etwas Preiselbeersaft hinzufügen.
preparationEN: Pour into a large glass with ice and stir. Add a little cranberry juice to taste.
preparationIT: Versare in un bicchiere grande con ghiaccio e mescolare.  Aggiungere un po 'di succo di mirtillo rosso a piacere.

preparationDE: Füllen Sie zuerst die Hälfte des Schnapsglases mit dem Kool-Aid. Dann legen Sie ein Papiertuch über das Glas und gießen Sie den Wodka langsam ein. Wenn du es richtig machst, solltest du sehen können, dass die beiden Flüssigkeiten getrennt sind, mit dem Wodka oben drauf. Jetzt knall es rein! Das Letzte, was du schmecken wirst, ist das Kool-Aid.
preparationEN: Fill half the shot glass with the kool-aid first. Then put a paper towel over the top of the glass and slowly pour in the vodka. If you do it right, you should be able to see that the two liquids are separated, with the vodka on top. Now slam it! The last thing you'll taste is the kool-aid.
preparationIT: Riempi prima metà del bicchierino con il kool-aid.  Quindi mettere un tovagliolo di carta sulla parte superiore del bicchiere e versare lentamente la vodka.  Se lo fai bene, dovresti essere in grado di vedere che i due liquidi sono separati, con la vodka sopra.  Ora sbattilo! L'ultima cosa che assaggerai è il kool-aid.

preparationDE: Geben Sie Kool Aid in ein Doppelschnapsglas und füllen Sie es mit Rum. Knall und Schuss.
preparationEN: Add Kool Aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.
preparationIT: Aggiungi Kool-Aid, successivamente aggiungi il rum.

preparationEN: Muddle the fruit with syrup in a mixing glass. Add ice and shake vigorously. Pour all ingredients(do not strain) in a tumbler glass. Add a float of Mango flavored Rum.

preparationDE: Geben Sie Absolut Kurant in eine bequeme, große Teetasse. Füge den nicht zu heißen(!) Apfeltee und, wenn du willst, etwas Zucker hinzu. Viel Spaß!
preparationEN: Pour Absolut Kurant into a comfortably big tea-cup. Add the not too hot(!) apple tea and, if you like, some sugar. Enjoy!
preparationIT: Versare Absolut Kurant in una tazza da tè comodamente grande.  Aggiungete il tè alla mela non troppo caldo (!) E, se vi piace, dello zucchero.  Godere!

preparationEN: Add all of the ingredients, except seeds, to a shaker with ice and shake well. Double strain onto fresh ice into a collins glass. Garnish with 1 spoon of passion fruit seeds.  *Pilon Syrup: Homemade 50/50 simple syrup using Pilon Sugar made from Mexican Sugar Cane.

Pour ingredients in a shaker tin, add ice and shake well.   Fine strain the drink into a double rocks glass filled with ice.   Balance a small watermelon triangle on top of the glass. Grate fresh lime zest on top using a microplane, and then sprinkle with Maldon salt.
Build spirits in a tall glass over clear ice. Top with 4 oz tonic and garnish with a lemon twist curled into a flower if you're feeling fancy.
Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (tranne l'acqua gassata) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail su due cubetti di ghiaccio. Riempite con acqua gassata, mescolate e servite.

preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake until proper dilution. Double strain into a chilled martini or coupe glass and garnish with 2 fresh basil leaves that have been lightly "spanked" to release aromatics.
In a mixing glass muddle mint, add all other ingredients and ice, shake, fine strain into a double old fashioned glass over fresh cracked ice. Garnish with cucumber slices and raspberries.
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and add ice. Shake well and double strain and serve into a coupe.
Add all ingredients to blender and blend throughly. Double strain into a glass with cracked ice garnish with a mint sprig and fresh grated nutmeg.

Spray vessel with absinthe as a rinse. Build cocktail in a stirring glass. Stir cocktail. Place a large format cube in the vessel. Pour cocktail over large format cube.   To garnish, peel a blood orange skin and express the oils over the cocktail. Grab mint sprigs and slap over the top of hand to express oils, wrap the peel at the base of the mint sprigs, tie off with twine and set on top of large format cube.  *Clarified Coconut Sugar Blood Orange Cordial: -- Blood Oranges -- Agar Agar -- Coconut Sugar  Juice blood oranges. Bring 1/4 of juice to a boil with agar agar. Pour cooked juice into the remaining 3/4 juice. Freeze the juice. Pull the block from the freezer and let drip through cheese cloth and perforated pan creating the clarified juice. Bring the juice together with a rich (2:1) coconut sugar creating a coconut sugar blood orange cordial.

In rocks glass, make an emulsion by using a glass muddler (wood muddlers absorb the ingredients too much). Place sugar cubes in glass. Add mezcal onto the cubes. Add bitters, onto cubes. Add drops of agave nectar, onto cubes. Add Luxardo, onto cubes. Muddle well to make a "syrup" paying attention the blending of all ingredients.  Take the long orange peel and twist all the essential oils into glass. Leave peel in glass.  Place Gläce Luxury Ice G-Cubed in glass. Rotate Gläce G-Cubed so that it becomes coated and chills the "syrup" swirl around the inside of glass. Pour the Anejo Tequila over Gläce G-Cubed. Stir with glass swizzle. Garnish with 3 Luxardo Cherries, speared.

Combine all liquids with exception of sodas, sir together. Strain into collins glass with singular large cube. Top with sodas. Garnish with sliver of poached pear from syrup (kept chilled).  *Rose Poached Pear Syrup: -- 1.5 C Rose (La Vielle Ferme or similar) -- 1.5 C Water  -- 2 C Sugar -- 1 Large Lemon -- 1 Half Orange -- 1 tsp Ground Ginger (not fresh) -- 1 tsp Vanilla -- 3-5 Whole Cloves  Combine Rose (La Vielle Ferme or similar), water, and sugar. Bring to a simmer. Add zest of lemon and an orange, ground ginger, vanilla, and cloves. Peel and halve pears, set gently into liquid. Keep just under a simmer for 15 mins. Remove from heat, let cool at least 20 mins. Pears will keep for 3 days refrigerated in syrup. The syrup itself will last longer.

preparationDE: In einem Mixer 3 Sekunden lang mischen. Lassi ist eines der am einfachsten herzustellenden Produkte, und es gibt viele Möglichkeiten, es herzustellen. Im Grunde ist es Buttermilch (Joghurt mit Wasser verrührt), und Sie können fast jede beliebige Konsistenz wählen, von der dünnsten bis zur dicksten. Kalt servieren.
preparationEN: Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Lassi is one of the easiest things to make, and there are many ways of making it. Basically, it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water), and you can choose almost any consistency that you like, from the thinnest to the thickest. Serve cold.
preparationIT: Frullare in un frullatore per 3 secondi. Lassi è una delle cose più facili da realizzare e ci sono molti modi per produrlo. Fondamentalmente, è latticello (yogurt sbattuto con acqua) e puoi scegliere quasi qualsiasi consistenza che preferisci, dalla più sottile alla più densa. Servire freddo.

preparationDE: Alles in einen Mixer geben und über das zerstoßene Eis gießen. Du kannst auch andere Früchte wie Erdbeeren und Bananen verwenden.
preparationEN: Put it all in a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.
preparationIT: Mettete il tutto in un frullatore e versateci sopra del ghiaccio tritato.Puoi anche usare altri frutti come fragole e banane.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einen Mixer geben und schaumig rühren. Kühl servieren.
preparationEN: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.
preparationIT: Metti tutti gli ingredienti in un frullatore e frulla fino a ottenere un composto omogeneo e spumoso. Servire freddo.

preparationDE: Im Mixer zu einem schaumigen Ganzen verrühren (Frappe). Zerrissene Curryblätter hinzufügen und kalt servieren.
preparationEN: Blend (frappe) in blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.
preparationIT: Frullare (frappe) nel frullatore fino a ottenere un composto spumoso.Aggiungere le foglie di curry strappate e servire freddo.

preparationDE: Joghurt und Eiswürfel zusammen mischen, bis der Joghurt flüssiger wird. Nach Belieben Zucker hinzufügen. Die Zitrone / Limette ist optional, verleiht ihr aber einen leicht herberen Geschmack. Eine Prise Salz. Raita ist auch gut für den Sommer. Anstatt einen traditionellen Salat zu essen, können Sie stattdessen Raita machen.
preparationEN: Blend the yoghurt and ice cubes together, until the yoghurt becomes more liquid. Add sugar to taste. The lemon/lime is optional but it gives it a slightly tart taste. Dash of salt. Raita is also good for the summer. Instead of having a traditional salad you can make raita instead.
preparationIT: Frullate insieme lo yogurt e i cubetti di ghiaccio, finché lo yogurt non diventa più liquido. Aggiungere lo zucchero a piacere. Il limone / lime è facoltativo ma gli conferisce un sapore leggermente aspro. Pizzico di sale.Invece di avere un'insalata tradizionale puoi invece preparare la raita. Raita va bene anche per l'estate.

preparationEN: Shake. Serve up. Garnish with lime wheel.
Shake all ingredients with ice then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Place ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake hard for seven seconds. Double strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with lemon peel.
Mix the coconut liqueur (preferably tequila) with the grapefruit juice and top with soda water. Garnish with a large grapefruit slice against the inside of the glass.
preparationIT: Mescolare il liquore al cocco (preferibilmente tequila) con il succo di pompelmo e guarnire con acqua di seltz. Versare una grossa fetta di pompelmo dentro il bicchiere.

preparationEN: Build in rocks glass. Use cylinder ice cube.

preparationDE: Schütteln und abseihen in ein gekühltes Cocktailglas mit Zuckerrand.
preparationEN: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.
preparationIT: Shakerare e filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail ghiacciato bordato di zucchero.

preparationDE: Galliano und Absolut Citron in einem Schnapsglas mischen, Zitronenkeil mit Zucker bestreut über Glas legen und Rum über Keil und Glas gießen. Light Rum mit einem Feuerzeug für eine Sekunde brennen lassen. Trinken Sie schnell und saugen Sie an der Zitrone. Wenn es richtig gemacht wird, schmeckt es wie ein Schuss süße Limonade.
preparationEN: Mix Galliano and Absolut Citron in a shot glass, lay lemon wedge sprinkled with sugar over glass and pour a rum over wedge and glass. light rum with a lighter and let burn for a second. Do shot quickly and suck on lemon. If it is done correctly, this will taste like a shot of sweet lemonade.
preparationIT: Unisci la vodka e il succo di limone in un bicchierino. Cospargere sopra 1/2 cucchiaino di zucchero. Mettere 2 cucchiaini di zucchero in un piattino; immergere gli spicchi di limone nello zucchero. Succhia un limone zuccherato dopo aver bevuto lo shot.

preparationDE: Die Zitronen entsaften. Den Ingwer schälen und raspeln. Den geriebenen Ingwer und einen kräftigen Spritzer Cayennepfeffer in ein Stück Seihtuch geben und zu einem Knoten binden. Im Wasser einweichen lassen. Nach etwa 15 Minuten den Zucker und den Zitronensaft hinzufügen. Abkühlen lassen und servieren.
preparationEN: Juice the lemons. Peel and grate the ginger. Place the grated ginger and a liberal dash of the cayenne pepper into a piece of cheesecloth, and tie it into a knot. Let soak in the water. After 15 minutes or so, add the sugar, and the lemon juice. Chill, and serve.
preparationIT: Mettere lo zenzero grattugiato spolverato di pepe di Caienna in un pezzo di garza, annodalo e lascia che lo zenzero e il pepe di Caienna infondano l'acqua in modo che l'acqua assuma sapore (circa 15 minuti).  Aggiungere lo zucchero e il succo di limone e mescolare bene.  Raffredda e servi freddo. (Puoi lasciare fuori il pepe di Caienna se lo desideri). Metti in frigo, aggiusta lo zucchero se necessario e servi.

notes: Photo credit: liquor.com
preparationEN: Add all ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into chilled stemmed cordial glass. Garnish with cocktail cherry and lemon twist.

notes: This is a perfect spring or summer cocktail. The Esprit de June is a product that offers a touch of floral complexity. The brightness of the lemon really works well with the floral notes of the Esprit de June.  The name is a play on words stating that less is more or (L.E.S. is more). The L.E.S. is an abbreviation for two things. First being Lower East Side as it is a NYC inspired cocktail. Second being Lemon, Esprit de June, and Seltzer. The three ingredients used in the cocktail to complement the Karlsson's Vodka.
preparationEN: Combine all liquid ingredients in a highball or Collins glass with ice. Stir lightly and garnish with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils out of the twist. Also make sure to rub the entire rim of the glass with the twist before dropping it into the cocktail.

preparationDE: In einem großen Glas Limettensaft und Zucker anrühren. Füge kaltes Selterswasser zum Befüllen hinzu. Die Limettenschalen in das Glas geben. Trink. Wiederholen Sie dies, bis Limetten oder Soda aufgebraucht sind.
preparationEN: In a large glass, put the lime juice and sugar, and stir well. Add cold seltzer water to fill. Put the lime peels in the glass. Drink. Repeat until limes or soda run out.
preparationIT: In un bicchiere grande mettere il succo di lime e lo zucchero e mescolare bene. Aggiungere acqua fredda di seltz per riempire. Ripeti finché i lime o la soda non si esauriscono. Mettere le bucce di lime nel bicchiere.

preparationDE: Öffne die Corona. Füllen Sie den leeren Platz im Hals in der Flasche mit dem Rum. Die Flasche sollte bis zum Anschlag gefüllt werden. Die Flasche mit dem Daumen oder der Handfläche verschließen. Drehen Sie die Flasche auf den Kopf, damit sich Rum und Bier vermischen. Drehen Sie die Flasche nach oben, ziehen Sie den Daumen heraus und trinken Sie.
preparationEN: Open the Corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.
preparationIT: Apri la Corona.  Riempi lo spazio vuoto nel collo della bottiglia con il rum.  La bottiglia dovrebbe essere riempita fino in fondo.  Copri la bottiglia con il pollice o il palmo della mano.  Capovolgi la bottiglia in modo che rum e birra si mescolino.  Capovolgi la bottiglia, drink pronto

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
preparationEN: Build in an old fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with orange peel.

notes: Note* this is for a 6-8 quart punch bowl
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl. Mix well.

preparationDE: In einem Mischglas, das halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, Scotch, Drambuie und Wermut kombinieren. Gut umrühren. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Mit der Zitronenscheibe garnieren.
preparationEN: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.
preparationIT: In un mixing glass riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire lo scotch, il drambuie e il vermouth. Filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail. Guarnire con la scorza di limone. Mescolare bene.

preparationDE: In einem Mischglas, das halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, alle Zutaten vermengen. Gut umrühren. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
preparationEN: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
preparationIT: In un mixing glass riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire tutti gli ingredienti. Filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail. Mescolare bene.

preparationEN: Stir with Ice and strain into a small wine glass.

preparationDE: Zutaten mit Eis verrühren, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationDE: Puderzucker und 2 oz. kohlensäurehaltiges Wasser in einem Collins-Glas verrühren. Das Glas mit Eis füllen, Gin und Wermut hinzufügen und umrühren. Mit kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser auffüllen und erneut umrühren. Fügen Sie die Zitronen- und die Orangenspirale hinzu, so dass das Ende über den Glasrand baumelt.
preparationEN: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.
preparationIT: Mescolare lo zucchero a velo 56g e mescola con con acqua gassata. Riempi il bicchiere di ghiaccio, aggiungi gin e vermouth e mescola. Riempi con acqua gassata e mescola di nuovo. Aggiungere la scorza di limone e la spirale d'arancia in modo che l'estremità penda sul bordo del vetro.

preparationEN: Shake. Serve up. Top with sparkling rose. Garnish with lime peel.

preparationDE: Den gesamten Inhalt in einem Highball-Glas mischen und vorsichtig umrühren. Für die Farbgebung einen Schuss Coca-Cola hinzufügen und mit Zitronen- oder Limettenspirale garnieren.
preparationEN: Mix all contents in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add dash of Coca-Cola for the coloring and garnish with lemon or lime twist.
preparationIT: Mescolare tutto il contenuto in un bicchiere highball e mescolare delicatamente.  Aggiungere un pizzico di Coca-Cola per la colorazione e guarnire con una scorza di limone o lime.

preparationEN: Served up and finished with a lemon wheel.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Cola) mischen und in einem Highball-Glas über Eis gießen. Füge einen Spritzer Cola hinzu, um Farbe zu erhalten. Mit einer Scheibe Zitrone dekorieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.
