preparationIT: Unisci tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la cola) e versa il ghiaccio in un bicchiere highball. Aggiungi la spruzzata di cola per il colore. Decorare con una fetta di limone e servire.

preparationDE: Schütteln Sie ein hohes Glas mit Eiswürfeln und Angostura und beschichten Sie so die Innenseite des Glases. Den Wodka darüber gießen, 1 Scheibe Limette hinzufügen und den Saft aus dem Rest herausquetschen, mit Tonic mischen, umrühren und voila, Sie haben einen langen Wodka.
preparationEN: Shake a tall glass with ice cubes and Angostura, coating the inside of the glass. Por the vodka onto this, add 1 slice of lime and squeeze juice out of remainder, mix with tonic, stir and voila you have a Long Vodka
preparationIT: Agitare un bicchiere alto con cubetti di ghiaccio e angostura, ricoprendo l'interno del bicchiere.  Versare la vodka su questo, aggiungere 1 fetta di lime e spremere il succo dal resto, mescolare con il tonico, mescolare e voilà hai una Long Vodka

preparationDE: Den Rum und Tia Maria in ein old-fashioned Glas gießen, das fast mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist. Gut umrühren.
preparationEN: Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.
preparationIT: Versare il rum e Tia Maria in un bicchiere vecchio stile quasi pieno di cubetti di ghiaccio. Mescolare bene.

preparationEN: Muddle basil in mixing glass, add all ingredients except club soda. Shake and strain into a collins glass, top with club soda.  Top with crushed ice and garnish with a basil sprig.

notes: Tasting notes- A curry like concoction with beautiful celery and tomato notes with a hint of spice in the back of the throat  Matthew chooses Sun Gold cherry tomatoes because they are easy to grow, care for, and yield an incredible amount of fruit.  Tip: Never water the leaves, only the base of the plant.  Please visit EAT YOUR DRINK at www.matthewbiancaniello.com
preparationEN: Muddle everything in a tin except Hophead. Then add Hophead and ice and shake and strain into a rocks glass with ice and garnish with a lovage sprig.

preparationDE: Füllen Sie ein Pintglas fast voll mit Bier. Dann den Rest mit Orangensaft füllen (darauf achten, ihn nicht nach oben zu füllen). Dann nimm den Schuss Amaretto und lass ihn rein.
preparationEN: Fill a pint glass almost full with beer. Then fill the rest with orange juice (careful not to fill it to the top). Then take the shot of Amaretto and drop it in.
preparationIT: Riempi un bicchiere da mezzo litro quasi pieno di birra.  Quindi riempire il resto con succo d'arancia (attenzione a non riempirlo fino in cima).  In un bicchiere da shot versaci l'Amaretto, infine versare lo shot sul mix fatto in precedenza.

preparationEN: Quick stir and garnish with rosemary.
Build syrup and ice cream in a lowball cocktail glass, and top with soda water. Serve with a metal straw, a spoon, and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.
Build over ice, stir lightly, and garnish with a lime twist and a Luxardo Cherry.
Shake well in a shaker, serve in a tumbler filled with ice. Top with soda water.
Dry shake all ingredients for 20-30 seconds. Then shake with ice. Double strain over fresh ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with wide lemon swath.
Add the Cherry Liqueur to a flute, top with Prosecco, and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.
Dry Shake, add ice and shake for 10 seconds. Double strain into a Copita Glass. Garnish with Dill.
Add all ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain over fresh ice. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.

notes: First served at Tales of the Cocktail 2014 "Luxardo CAP Lunch"
preparationEN: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass. Add ice and integration shake. Pour over fresh ice into a highball and top with California Lager. Garnish with a half orange wheel.

In a mixing glass, add ice and shake with all of the ingredients. Strain over new ice (large sphere ice cube) and serve in old fashioned glass and grate fresh cinnamon over the ice.  *Apple Cider Reduction: Boil apple cider until it reduces in volume by half.  **Cinnamon-Chipotle Syrup: Bring 1 cup sugar, 1 cup water and 3 cinnamon sticks to boil, take off heat and let steep for 20mins, add chipotle powder and mix well.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln. In ein Glas abseihen. Garnieren und mit Trinkhalm servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio.Filtrare nel bicchiere.

preparationEN: Barrel aged in a used bourbon barrel that previously held a cocktail containing Hine Cognac and Luxardo Bitter.  Stir with ice and strain into a small coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.

Serve in a julep cup with crushed ice and basil garnish.  *Serrano Pepper Syrup: Take 6 serrano peppers. Slice 4 in half, carefully de-vein and seed them (this will take some of the heat away, make absolutely sure to wash your hands after handling the peppers, avoid touching anything unless you've washed your hands), place a skillet on medium to high heat and roast the peppers until they are a little charred. Once charred place in a blender with about 2 cups of water and throw in the 2 remaining fresh serranos (seeds and all). Blend and strain out the solids. Add 1 cup of demarara sugar to the serrano pepper water and stir until it is dissolved.

preparationDE: Über Eis gerührt, in ein gekühltes Glas geseiht, garniert und serviert.
preparationEN: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.
preparationIT: Mescolate su ghiaccio, filtrate in un bicchiere freddo, guarnite e servite.

preparationEN: Add ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously strain over fresh ice. Garnish with lemon peel to fit in glass and 1 dash of Abbott's Aromatic Bitters. Optional sugar rim.

notes: Photo credit: bargiornale.it
preparationEN: Prepare directly in an old fashioned glass.

preparationDE: Reiben Sie den Rand des Glases mit der Limettenscheibe, damit das Salz daran haftet. Achten Sie darauf, dass nur der äußere Rand angefeuchtet wird und streuen Sie das Salz darauf. Das Salz sollte sich auf den Lippen des Genießers befinden und niemals in den Cocktail einmischen. Die anderen Zutaten mit Eis schütteln und vorsichtig in das Glas geben.
preparationEN: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.
preparationIT: Strofina il bordo del bicchiere con la fetta di lime per far aderire il sale.  Avere cura di inumidire solo il bordo esterno e cospargere di sale.  Il sale dovrebbe presentarsi alle labbra del bevitore e non mescolarsi mai al cocktail.  Shakerare gli altri ingredienti con ghiaccio, quindi versarli delicatamente nel bicchiere.

notes: Featured at the 2016/2017 SpeedRack
preparationEN: Mix all ingredients together.
Combine ingredients in an ice-filled mixing glass and stir for 20 to 30 seconds, or until well chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon peel.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in ein Mischglas geben und mit Eis füllen. Bis zum Abkühlen umrühren und in ein gekühltes Coupéglas abseihen.
preparationEN: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice.    Stir until chilled, and strain into a chilled coupe glass.
preparationIT: Aggiungere tutti gli ingredienti in un mixing glass e riempire di ghiaccio, mescolare fino a quando si saranno raffreddati e filtrare in un bicchiere da coupé freddo.

preparationDE: Direkt: Alle Zutaten in ein Mischglas mit Eiswürfeln geben. Gut umrühren. In einem gekühlten Martini-Cocktailglas abseihen. Den Saft aus der Zitronenschale auf das Getränk drücken oder mit Olive garnieren.
preparationEN: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti nel mixing glass con cubetti di ghiaccio. Mescolare bene. Spremi la scorza di limone sulla bevanda o guarnisci con l'oliva.Filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail Martini ghiacciata.

preparationDE: Schütteln und abseihen in ein gekühltes großes Cocktailglas.
preparationEN: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass
preparationIT: Shakerare e filtrare in una grande coppetta da cocktail fredda

preparationDE: 2 Tassen Wasser zum Kochen bringen. Alle Zutaten zugeben und nochmals ca. 15 Sekunden kochen lassen. Eine Minute stehen lassen. Milch in einem Topf erwärmen. Tee in Tassen filtern. Milch und Zucker hinzufügen. Servieren.
preparationEN: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.
preparationIT: Porta ad ebollizione 2 tazze d'acqua.  Aggiungere tutti gli ingredienti e far bollire di nuovo per circa 15 secondi.  Lascia riposare per un minuto.  Latte caldo in una pentola.  Filtra il tè in tazze.  Aggiungere il latte e lo zucchero.  Questo è tutto.

preparationEN: Muddle orange twist with sugar. Add ice. Pour ingredients over ice. Add bitters
Spray a rocks glass with absinthe, build all other ingredients over cubed ice, garnish with a lemon wheel.
Garnish: mint and lime wheel

notes: Something light and refreshing for all palates while still allowing the rum to shine through. The perfect balance of sweet and sour.
preparationEN: Shake, and fine strain into a chilled coupe, and garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

notes: * Mixture is barrel aged for 5 months in a used Bourbon Barrel
preparationEN: Stir in a mixing glass to chill down and serve up in a coupe with a lemon zest garnish.
In a pint glass pour all the ingredients, stir and strain into a bucket glass 3/4 full of ice and garnish with an orange peel.
Shake all ingredients. Strain and top with ginger beer. Give it a quick stir.   Tajin ground ginger and salt rim.

Fill Chinaco stemmed flute with prosecco, cava or other dry sparkling. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry pinned inside of lemon peel and rested across rim. The cherry garnish which will be EVER so delicately laid across the top of the glass, should flame in my opinion. You can dip the in high-proof spirits and light it up!
Stir over ice and strain into a Nick and Nora glass.

preparationDE: Espresso zubereiten. In eine Kaffeetasse 1 Teelöffel ungesüßten, pulverisierten Kakao geben, dann einen Teelöffel Honig in die Tasse träufeln. Rühren Sie um, während der Kaffee brüht, das ist der lustige Teil. Der Kakao scheint den Honig ohne Mischen zu überziehen, so dass Sie eine dichte, klebrige Masse erhalten, die aussieht, als würde sie sich nie vermischen. Dann auf einmal, presto! Es sieht aus wie dunkle Schokoladensoße. Heißen Espresso über den Honig gießen und unter Rühren auflösen. Mit Sahne servieren.
preparationEN: Brew espresso. In a coffee mug, place 1 teaspoon of unsweetened powdered cocoa, then cover a teaspoon with honey and drizzle it into the cup. Stir while the coffee brews, this is the fun part. The cocoa seems to coat the honey without mixing, so you get a dusty, sticky mass that looks as though it will never mix. Then all at once, presto! It looks like dark chocolate sauce. Pour hot espresso over the honey, stirring to dissolve. Serve with cream.
preparationIT: Prepara l'espresso.  In una tazza da caffè, mettete 1 cucchiaino di cacao amaro in polvere, quindi coprite un cucchiaino con del miele e versatelo nella tazza.  Mescola mentre il caffè si prepara, questa è la parte divertente.  Il cacao sembra ricoprire il miele senza mescolarsi, quindi si ottiene una massa polverosa e appiccicosa che sembra non si mescolerà mai.  Versare l'espresso caldo sul miele, mescolando per scioglierlo.  Servire con la panna.

preparationEN: Mix ingredients together then pour over crushed ice into a Julep tin. Dust with salt, sugar, and cinnamon.
Ice: Large block or spherical

Chill cup and place a napkin around it. In the base of the cup put everything except the cider and the raspberry syrup and give a brief stir. Add some crushed ice. Stir vigorously. Top with crushed ice. Add cider. Pour raspberry syrup on top. Garnish with cinnamon quill as a stirrer, some small flowers, and a lime wheel.

notes: *2:1 sugar (raw) to Mexican coffee.
preparationEN: Stir, serve on a large rock with an orange twist garnish.
shake/2xstrain/coupe  garnish cucumber slice

preparationDE: Zuerst: Pina Colada mit 7,5 cl. Rum und Eis mischen (beiseite legen). Zweitens: Daiquiri mit 7,5 cl. Rum und Eis mischen. Drittens: Im gefrorenen Zustand Pina Colda-Mix hinzufügen, dann Daiquiri in Glas mischen (Achten Sie darauf, dass sie nicht miteinander vermischt werden).
preparationEN: First: Mix pina colada with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice(set aside). Second: Mix daiquiri with 2.5 oz. of rum with ice. Third: While frozen, add pina colda mix then daiquiri mix in glass (Making sure they do not get mixed together).
preparationIT: Primo: mescola la pina colada con 75ml di rum con ghiaccio (mettere da parte).  Secondo: mescola daiquiri con 75ml di rum con ghiaccio.  Terzo: mentre è freddo, aggiungi il mix di pina colada e poi i daiquiri nel bicchiere (assicurandoti che non si mescolino insieme).

preparationEN: Mix the beer with tomato juice, freshly squeezed lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, or hot sauce.  Served In a chilled, salt-rimmed glass
preparationIT: Mescola la birra con succo di pomodoro, succo di lime appena spremuto e salsa Worcestershire, salsa teriyaki, salsa di soia o salsa piccante.  Servito in un bicchiere ghiacciato bordato di sale

preparationDE: Füllen Sie einen Mixer mit Eis und fügen Sie Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager und Sahne hinzu. 5 Sekunden schütteln und in ein mit Eis gefülltes Doppelglas abseihen. Fügen Sie gekühlten Kaffee hinzu Rühren und genießen Sie!
preparationEN: Fill a mixer with ice and add Baileys, Kahlua, Goldshlager, and cream. Shake for 5 seconds and Strain into a double rocks glass filled with ice. Add chilled coffee Stir and enjoy!
preparationIT: Riempi un mixing glass con ghiaccio e aggiungi Baileys, Kahlua, Goldschlager e panna. Shakerare per 5 secondi e filtrare in un bicchiere double rocks pieno di ghiaccio. Aggiungi caffè freddo Mescola e divertiti!

preparationDE: Wenn verfügbar, Cocktailglas (Martini) mit Zuckersirup, dann in Schokoladenflocken oder Pulver eintauchen. Zutaten in den Shaker mit Eis geben. Gut schütteln und dann in ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
preparationEN: If available, rim cocktail (Martini) glass with sugar syrup then dip into chocolate flakes or powder. Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well then strain into cocktail glass.
preparationIT: Se disponibile, bordare il bicchiere da cocktail con sciroppo di zucchero e immergerlo in scaglie di cioccolato o polvere.  Aggiungi gli ingredienti in uno shaker con ghiaccio.  Shakerare bene e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail.

preparationEN: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with lime pinwheel and bing cherry.

preparationDE: Achten Sie darauf, dass beide Zutaten gut gekühlt sind, und mischen Sie sie dann in das Glas. Kalt servieren.
preparationEN: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.
preparationIT: Assicurati che entrambi gli ingredienti siano ben raffreddati, quindi mescolali nel bicchiere.  Servire freddo.

preparationEN: Muddle red pepper and mint. Add all other ingredients. Shake well over ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with red pepper slice and mint sprig.

preparationDE: In einem Highball-Glas die Minze, den Zucker und das Wasser vorsichtig verrühren. Füllen Sie das Glas mit gebrochenem Eis, fügen Sie Bourbon hinzu und rühren Sie gut um, bis das Glas gut gefrostet ist. Mit einem Minzzweig garnieren.
preparationEN: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.
preparationIT: In un bicchiere highball pestare delicatamente la menta, lo zucchero e l'acqua.  Riempite il bicchiere con ghiaccio tritato, aggiungete il Bourbon e mescolate bene fino a quando il bicchiere sarà ben glassato.  Guarnire con un rametto di menta.

preparationEN: Whip / Dump / Crushed

notes: http://www.foodrepublic.com/2014/11/07/miyagikyo-kick-cocktail-recipe
preparationEN: Combine ingredients into a cocktail shaker.  Shake with ice vigorously for 10-15 seconds.  Strain into a chilled coupe glass. No garnish.

preparationDE: Geben Sie 18 cl. Kaffee in eine Tasse oder eine irische Kaffeetasse. Fügen Sie Kokamischung und Chambord hinzu, mischen Sie gut und geben Sie Schlagsahne dazu.
preparationEN: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.
preparationIT: Versa 170gr di caffè in una tazza o in una tazza di caffè irlandese.  Unire il mix di cacao e lo Chambord, mescolare bene e completare con la panna montata.

preparationDE: Minzblätter mit Zucker und Limettensaft verrühren. Füge einen Spritzer Sodawasser hinzu und fülle das Glas mit gebrochenem Eis. Den Rum eingießen und mit Sodawasser übergießen. Garnieren und mit einem Strohhalm servieren.
preparationEN: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.
preparationIT: Pestare le foglie di menta con lo zucchero e il succo di lime.  Aggiungere una spruzzata di acqua di seltz e riempi il bicchiere con ghiaccio tritato.  Versare il rum e riempire con acqua di seltz.  Guarnire con una fetta di lime, servire con una cannuccia.

preparationDE: Minze mit Zitronensaft in ein Glas geben, Minze mit einem Löffel zerdrücken. Eis und Rum hinzufügen und mit Soda auffüllen. Krönen Sie es mit Angostura.
preparationEN: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.
preparationIT: Metti la menta con il succo di limone in un bicchiere, schiaccia la menta con un cucchiaio, ghiaccio, rum e riempila con la soda.  Completalo con Angostura.

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
preparationEN: Shake, fine strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with lemon twist.

preparationDE: Im Shaker über Eiswürfel gießen, in ein gekühltes Cocktailglas abseihen.
preparationEN: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
preparationIT: Shakerare bene sopra i cubetti di ghiaccio in uno shaker, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail fredda.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in ein old-fashioned Glas geben, das fast mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist. Gut umrühren.
preparationEN: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in un bicchiere vecchio stile quasi riempito di cubetti di ghiaccio.Mescolare bene.

preparationDE: Erst den Absinth, dann den Tequila, dann den Grenadinesirup.
preparationEN: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.
preparationIT: Prima metti l'assenzio, poi la tequila, poi lo sciroppo di granatina.

preparationEN: Place the mint in a tumbler glass and muddle briskly to release the essential oils, then add the cherry liqueur and the brandy. Fill up the glass with crushed ice, stir well and serve with a float of Luxardo Amaretto. Garnish with 4 sprigs of mint and 3 Luxardo Cherries.

preparationDE: Mischen Sie Wodka und Ingwerbier in einem mit Eis gefüllten Highball-Glas. Limettensaft hinzufügen. Vorsichtig umrühren. Garnieren.
preparationEN: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.
preparationIT: Unisci la vodka e la ginger beer in un bicchiere highball pieno di ghiaccio.  Aggiungi il succo di lime.  Mescola delicatamente.

preparationDE: Über Eis schütteln, abseihen. Für zwei Personen.
preparationEN: Shake over ice, strain. Serves two.
preparationIT: Shakerare sul ghiaccio, filtrare.  Per due persone.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients except for tonic. Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Top with the tonic and garnish with a fresh grapefruit peel.   *Substitute with Yellow Chartreuse Liqueur
Shaker and strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. Garnish with an Apple Fan.
In a shaker, gently muddle the strawberry. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a coupe. Garnish with strawberry.

preparationDE: Füge den gesamten Inhalt in eine große Kanne oder Bowle. Gut umrühren!
preparationEN: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!
preparationIT: Aggiungi tutto il contenuto a una brocca grande o una ciotola da punch.Mescolare bene!

preparationEN: Add cubed ice to a highball, add 2 dashes of Angostura Bitters, top with ginger beer, garnish with a sprig of basil.

preparationDE: 3 Tassen Wasser mit Zucker, Nelken, Zimtstangen und Zitronenschale in einem Edelstahltopf 10 Minuten köcheln lassen. Wein auf "Kaffeetemperatur" erhitzen (nicht kochen) und füge dann den Brandy hinzu.
preparationEN: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy.
preparationIT: Fai bollire 3 tazze di acqua con, zucchero, chiodi di garofano, bastoncini di cannella e scorza di limone in una pentola di acciaio inossidabile per 10 minuti.  Portare il vino a "temperatura del caffè" (NON BOLLITE) quindi aggiungere il brandy.

preparationEN: Fill glass with ice  Pour Gin and Lime Juice  Fill glass with Ginger Beer  Garnish with Cucumer and Lime slice
preparationIT: Riempi il bicchiere di ghiaccio  Versare il gin e il succo di lime  Riempi il bicchiere con Ginger Beer  Guarnire con cetriolo e fetta di lime

notes: Adapted from Francesco Lafranconi's recipe in the Luxardo cocktail book. He originally called for Luxardo Dry Gin, which we have replaced with No.3 London Dry Gin.
preparationEN: Muddle the kiwi pulp with lime juice in a shaker tin. Add ice and liquors and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Muddle the kumquats and lychee in a cocktail shaker. Add the whiskey, King's Ginger, lemon juice, syrup and white egg, and shake very hard. Double strain into a highball glass filled with ice spheres.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einen Shaker mit Eis geben. Gut schütteln. Auf Eis servieren.
preparationEN: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.
preparationIT: Versa tutti gli ingredienti in uno shaker di ghiaccio.  Agitare bene.  Servire con ghiaccio.

notes: Recipe credit goes to: Jennifer Costello, Charles Lintott & Sarah Holmes
preparationEN: Muddle Orange Slice. Add Nikka. Add Ginger Syrup. Stir over Ice. Add bitters.

notes: *Kiwi-infused Ypioca Cachaca Prata
preparationEN: Shaken, poured over fresh ice in highball. Garnish with macadamia nut. Coconut shaved rim.

notes: For a slightly sweeter version, replace Luxardo bitters with Aperol.
preparationDE: In ein Glas über das Eis gießen, garnieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare nel bicchiere con ghiaccio, guarnire e servire.

notes: Photo credit: Brian Oh
preparationEN: Combine ingredients in an old fashioned glass filled with ice, stir to combine, and garnish with orange peel.
Whisk ingredients in birdie (or tin). Pour into coupe glass and top with Prosecco (1 oz). Garnish with dehydrated orange wheel. Spray orange flower from atomizer.

notes: Photo credit: Tim Turner (The Modern Mixologist: Contemporary Classic Cocktails)
preparationEN: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until well chilled and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a flamed orange twist.
Shake and strain into a tiki cat filled with crushed ice.

notes: Featured in The King's Ginger Winter Warmer Program OND 2015
preparationEN: Build then pour into a pre-heated Irish coffee glass or mug. Top with hot water. Garnish with the orange slice and add a dash of Peychaud's Bitters.

Combine Luxardo, cachaca, gin, coconut water, tincture and almond extract in a yari (mixing glass). Add ice. Stir for proper dilution (30-40 revolutions). Pour in collins glass over a clarified ice sphere. Top cocktail with Fever-Tree. Add 3 almond slices for garnish.  *Toasted Coconut Tincture: -- 4 oz (by weight) Semisweet Coconut Flakes -- High-Proof Neutral Grain Spirit (preferably Everclear)  Lightly toast semisweet coconut flakes. Put in a small mason jar. Fill jar with high-proof neutral grain spirit. Let sit for 3 days then strain off.

Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice. Stir for about 10 seconds and then strain into a chilled cocktail coupe. Garnish with skewered apple spheres and be thankful you're having a cocktail, and not having an apple shot off your head.

preparationDE: In einem gekühlten Cocktailglas servieren. Zitrone und Zucker auf den Rand geben. Rühren und abseihen.
preparationEN: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.
preparationIT: Servire in una coppetta da cocktail ghiacciata.  Limone e zucchero sul bordo.  Mescola e filtra.

preparationDE: Gemischten Whiskey, Zitronensaft und Puderzucker mit Eis schütteln und in ein Whiskey-Sourglas abseihen. Schwimmender Bordeaux auf der Oberfläche. Mit der halben Zitronenscheibe und der Kirsche dekorieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret on top. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon and the cherry and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare il whisky miscelato, il succo di limone e lo zucchero a velo con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere da whisky sour. Versare il vino in cima.Decorare con mezza fetta di limone e la ciliegia e servire.

preparationEN: Add cognac, amaro, lemon, strawberry syrup and fresh cracked egg white of a whole egg to tin. Dry shake without ice approx. 5 seconds to emulsify. Add ice and shake hard again approx. 10 seconds. Fine strain into coupe. Crack drag black pepper over surface. Serve and enjoy.  *Strawberry syrup- 1 cup fresh strawberries 1 cup water 1cup sugar. Blend in vitamix then heat on stove and stir until hot to bind sugars, don't boil. Bottle and refrigerate.

notes: This cocktail is a spin on a classic cocktail called the "Vieux Carré" or "Old Square". The original cocktail was created by a bartender at The Hotel Monteleone in New Orleans. Though this drink may have been derived from a traditional vermouth cocktail created in the mid-1800s, many people who encounter the Vieux Carré today will equate it to a Manhattan variation, served on the rocks.  This new or "Nieux" version is a little nuttier and lighter in body. The nutty flavors of the sherry brandy really play off the savory earthy notes of the Karlsson's Gold Vodka. Enjoy this cocktail with some cheese or as an after dinner drink. It is perfect in front of a fireplace.
preparationEN: Combine all liquid ingredients in a chilled mixing glass with cracked ice and stir for 20 seconds. Double strain the cocktail over a large cube placed in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils out of the twist. Also make sure to rub the entire rim of the glass with the twist before dropping it into the cocktail.
Stir. Use large ice cube.
In mixing glass or cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine whiskey, vermouth, and bitters. Stir well, about 20 seconds, then strain into cocktail glass. Add cherry and serve.

In an old fashioned glass, muddle the lemon peel with the bitters and demerara syrup, just enough to bruise the peel and release its oils. Add Coffey Malt and ice, and stir for 20 to 30 seconds, or until well chilled.
Stir over ice and serve in a rocks glass.

Stir ingredients over cracked ice. With a julep strainer, pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Once poured, top with lemon foam.  *Dry Vermouth Infusion: -- 1.5 oz Togarashi Spice -- 3 Vanilla Beans -- 2 bags of Green Tea Place ingredients in cheesecloth to steep in a bell jar with 1 bottle of Dolin Dry vermouth for 2 days.  Remove the infusion elements and refrigerate the infusion.  **Lemon Foam: -- 1 bsp Lemon Juice -- 1 bsp Simple Syrup -- 1 Egg White  Place ingredients into a shaker tin and whip with a bar whisk into a foam.
Shake all ingredients well in cocktail shaker. Strain into ice filled rock glass. Top with soda.
Mix all the liquid contents together in a heavy-bottomed tumbler with ice. Stir. Add a slice of orange and lemon zest to decorate.
Pour No.3 gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add a slice of lemon and stir. Top up with tonic water to taste.
Shake first three ingredients in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled serving glass. Top with chilled champagne, or sparkling wine.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, stir, and strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with a picked cucumber ribbon.  *Nori-Infused Sake:  -- Ginjo Sake -- Nori Seaweed Sheet  Using an Oji Style Cold Brew Coffee Maker, drip Ginjo sake through a 0.5 gram of nori seaweed sheet that has been hand-shredded. It takes 3 hours to infuse a 750 ml bottle.

notes: *Grenadine: Equal parts POM 100 and granulated sugar
preparationEN: Shake - pebble/crushed ice

notes: Featured on the Padrecito cocktail menu august (fall) 2015
preparationEN: Add all ingredients together.

preparationDE: Mit etwas Milch (etwa 3 cl.) in der Kaffeetasse mischen. Für ca. 30-50 Sekunden erhitzen. Rühren, bis sich der erhitzte Kakao auflöst. Füllen Sie die Tasse mit Milch ein. Nochmals erhitzen.
preparationEN: Mix with a bit of milk (1 oz or so) in coffee mug. Nuke mug for about 30-50 seconds. Stir until the heated cocoa dissolves. Fill mug with milk. Nuke for 1-2 minutes, depending on wattage and preferences as to burnt mouth parts.
preparationIT: Mescola tutti gli ingredienti con un po’ di latte (circa 3 cl. ). Riscaldare per circa 30-50 secondi.  Mescolare fino a quando il cacao riscaldato si scioglie.  Riempi la tazza di latte.  Riscalda di nuovo.

preparationDE: Auf Eis servieren
preparationEN: Serve over ice
preparationIT: Servire con ghiaccio

preparationDE: Einfach alles zusammenmischen. Es soll ein Shot sein, aber es funktioniert genauso gut wie ein richtiges Getränk in Erwachsenengröße über viel Eis. Schmeckt wie ein Haferflockenplätzchen.
preparationEN: Just mix it all together.  It's meant to be a shot, but it works just fine as a proper adult-sized drink over lots of ice.    Tastes like an oatmeal cookie.
preparationIT: Mescola tutto insieme.  È pensato per essere uno shot, ma funziona perfettamente come una bevanda per adulti con un sacco di ghiaccio.

preparationEN: Shake all ingredients for 10-15 seconds (over shaking will over dilute) and fine strain into chilled coupe glass. Garnish with Xoconostle (sour prickly pear) and a stuffed Castelvetrano olive.
Stir with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.
Place all ingredients into a Yarai mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a coupe. Garnish with an apple slice.
Add gin, lemon juice, maraschino liqueur, and liqueur de violette to a collins glass filled with ice. Add tonic water; stir to combine. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Add 6-8 sugar snap peas to cocktail shaker. Lightly muddle the peas. Add all other ingredients except for the tonic. Shake and double strain into a collins glass. Top with tonic.   *House-made Simple Syrup:  -- 1 cup Sugar -- 1 cup Water  Add equal parts sugar and water into a small saucepan, bring to a boil; simmer until the sugar is dissolved, approximately 3 minutes. Remove from heat, let cool to room temperature and transfer to a clean glass jar. Cover and keep refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.

preparationDE: Zuckerwürfel in ein old fashioned Glas geben und mit Bitterstoff sättigen, einen Schuss Wasser hinzufügen. Vermischen, bis sie sich auflösen.
preparationEN: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved.  Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.    Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.
preparationIT: Mettere la zolletta di zucchero nel bicchiere vecchio stile e saturare con il bitter, aggiungere un goccio di acqua naturale.  Pestare finché non si scioglie.  Riempi il bicchiere con cubetti di ghiaccio e aggiungi il whisky.  Guarnire con una scorza d'arancia e una ciliegina al maraschino.

preparationDE: Cocktailglas kühl stellen. Geben Sie die Zutaten in ein Mischglas und füllen Sie 2/3 der Zutaten mit Eis. Etwa 20 Sekunden umrühren. Cocktailglas in das Glas abseihen. Mit einer Zitronenspirale garnieren.
preparationEN: Chill cocktail glass. Add ingredients to a mixing glass, and fill 2/3 full with ice. Stir about 20 seconds. Empty cocktail glass and strain into the glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.
preparationIT: Raffredda un bicchiere da cocktail.  Aggiungere gli ingredienti in un mixing glass e riempire con 2/3 di ghiaccio.  Mescola per circa 20 secondi.  Filtrare nel bicchiere.  Guarnire con una scorza di limone.

preparationEN: Combine the ingredients. Shake and strain over ice. Lemon and/or cherry flag garnish.  Add soda water if you'd like to water it down.
Muddle 3-4 cucumber slices and a couple mint leaves. Shake and strain into martini or coupe glass. Garnish with lime or mint or cucumber.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients and double strain over fresh ice. Garnish with lemon verbena leaf.  *Lemon Verbena Cordial: -- Fresh Lemon Verbena  -- Fresh Mint -- Grapefruit Peel  -- Lemon Peel -- Pure Cane Sugar -- Citric Acid  Make a fresh herb and citrus peel tea and add sugar and citric acid to taste. Let cool before using.

notes: Photo credit: liquor.com
preparationEN: Add cognac, rye, Chartreuse and bitters to a mixing glass with ice, and stir until cold. Add splash of fernet to a rocks glass, roll the glass to coat the sides, and discard the excess. Add one large ice cube to the glass, strain the drink over the cube, and garnish with a mint sprig.
Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.  *Don's Mix: -- 2 parts Grapefruit Juice -- 1 part Cinnamon Syrup

preparationDE: Legen Sie einige Eiswürfel in einen großen Becher oder ein Highball-Glas, geben Sie Zitronensaft, Orangensaft, Zuckersirup hinzu und rühren Sie gut um. Mit kaltem Sodawasser auffüllen, mit einem Trinkhalm servieren.
preparationEN: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.
preparationIT: Mettere alcuni cubetti di ghiaccio in un grande bicchiere tumbler o highball, aggiungere il succo di limone, il succo d'arancia, lo sciroppo di zucchero e mescolare bene.Rabboccare con acqua fredda di soda, servire con una cannuccia.

preparationEN: Put 1 1/2 ounces, 2 1/2 ounces orange juice, and 1-2 tablespoons of sugar in a shaker. Add ice cubes and shake for a few seconds. Put in glass and serve.

preparationDE: Geben Sie alle Zutaten in den Tumbler-Pour als Shot.
preparationEN: Add all ingredients to tumbler-Pour as shot
preparationIT: Aggiungere tutti gli ingredienti al tumbler-Versare come uno shot

preparationDE: Brandy, Gin und Orangensaft mit Eis schütteln und in ein Highball-Glas über Eiswürfel abseihen. Mit Ginger Ale füllen, umrühren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare brandy, gin e succo d'arancia con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere highball con cubetti di ghiaccio. Riempi con ginger ale, mescola e servi.

preparationDE: Mische Liköre in einem Mixer. Eine halbe Kugel Eis hinzufügen und untermischen. Mit einer Orange- und Kirschfahne garnieren. So gut, dass es in deinem Mund schmilzt.
preparationEN: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!
preparationIT: Unisci i liquori in un frullatore.  Aggiungere mezzo misurino di ghiaccio e frullare.  Guarnire con una bandiera di arancia e ciliegia.

preparationEN: Add the spirits to the bottom of the glass and top equally with the mixer drinks. Garnish with orange slices inside the glass as well as some rosemary on top.
preparationIT: Aggiungere gli alcolici sul fondo del bicchiere e sopra ugualmente con le bevande del mixer. Guarnire con fettine d'arancia nel bicchiere e sopra un po 'di rosmarino.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einem Topf vermengen und bei schwacher Hitze umrühren, bis die Schokolade schmilzt. Die Hitze erhöhen und unter ständigem Rühren zum Kochen bringen. Vom Herd nehmen und ununterbrochen schaumig schlagen. Wieder aufwärmen und wieder zum Kochen bringen. Vom Herd nehmen, verquirlen und schaumig rühren. Wiederholen Sie das Erwärmen und Verquirlen noch einmal. Orangenschale entsorgen (Kann 2 Stunden im Voraus zubereitet werden. Bei Raumtemperatur stehen lassen. Vor dem Servieren einfach zum Kochen bringen, vom Herd nehmen und schaumig schlagen.) Gießen Sie die heiße Schokolade in Kaffeetassen. Macht 2 Portionen.
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk untily frothy. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat, whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving, bring just to boil, remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.
preparationIT: Unisci tutti gli ingredienti tranne l'arancia in una casseruola media.  Mescolare a fuoco basso fino a quando il cioccolato si scioglie.  Aumenta la fiamma e porta a ebollizione, mescolando spesso.  Spegni il fuoco e frulla fino a renderle leggermente spumose.  Accendi il fuoco e riporta a bollore.  Spegni il fuoco, sbattere fino a quando non diventa spumoso.  Scartare la buccia d'arancia.  (Può essere preparato 2 ore prima. Lasciar riposare a temperatura ambiente. Prima di servire, portate appena ad ebollizione, spegnete il fuoco e frullate fino a quando non sarà spumoso) Versare la cioccolata calda nelle tazze da caffè. Per 2 porzioni.

preparationDE: Zutaten über Eis gießen und umrühren.
preparationEN: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.
preparationIT: Versare gli ingredienti sul ghiaccio e mescolare.

preparationEN: Shake and 2x strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel and Luxardo Cherry.

preparationDE: Mischen Sie Wodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, Eis und den Oreo gut in einem Mixer. In ein großes mattiertes Glas geben. Mit Schlagsahne und einer Kirsche garnieren.
preparationEN: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.
preparationIT: Mescola bene Vodka, Kahlua, Baileys, gelato e un oreo in un frullatore. Versare in un grande bicchiere. Guarnire con panna montata e una ciliegia.

preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail fredda e servire.

preparationDE: Zutaten im Mixer vermengen.
preparationEN: Add ingredients and mix in blender.
preparationIT: Aggiungere gli ingredienti e mescola nel frullatore.

preparationEN: Pour all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain over ice into a Collins or Pilsner glass.

notes: Photo credit: liquor.com
preparationEN: Fill shaker with ingredients and ice. Shake. Strain into old fashioned or rocks glass filled with ice.
Shake the first four ingredients with ice then strain into a tall glass filled with ice and top with lemon lime soda. Stir and serve.
Pour ingredients into a wine glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a half-slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry.
Shake first 4 ingredients and strain into collins. Top with pebble ice. Top with the rose. Garnish with a basil and a lime flower for aromatics.

preparationDE: Zusammenrühren und über Eis servieren.
preparationEN: Stir together and serve over ice.
preparationIT: Mescolate e servite con ghiaccio.

preparationEN: Shake and top with Anchor Steam.

preparationDE: Zusammen über Eis schütteln. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen und gekühlt servieren.
preparationEN: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti insieme al ghiaccio. Filtrare nella coppetta da cocktail e servire freddo.

preparationEN: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with orange slice and 1 bar spoon juniper berries.
Stir and pour over ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange peel.
Stir over 1 large rock. Garnish with zest of an orange peel.

In a mixing glass, combine Pink Pigeon Rum, Lychee Juice and the juice from 1/2 a lime. Add the pulp of one passion fruit (to prep passion fruit: cut in half, setting aside a small slice for garnish and scoop out the pulp and drop both the pulp and peel into the glass). Add ice and shake vigorously. Pour in a tall glass over ice, top with ginger beer.  Garnish with the passion fruit wedge to serve.
Put 1/2 passion fruit inner part in a blender, 1-2 tablespoons of sugar and 50ml ( 1 1/2 ounces) of Ypiòca. Mix for a few seconds. Filter in a glass and serve with ice.
Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir. Garnish with half a passion fruit piece.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in un bicchiere e mescolare. Guarnire con mezzo pezzo di frutto della passione.

preparationEN: Wet half of the rim of a 13 oz. rocks glass with Benedictine. Shake off the excess Benedictine to avoid clumping on the rim and dip it into the peanut butter powder. Flick the glass to shake the excess powder off. Place the glass in a cooler to chill the glass. In a frozen mixing glass combine all liquid ingredients with equal parts cracked ice and whole hard ice. Stir the cocktail for 45 seconds. Remove the glass from the cooler and place a 2 in. hard ice cube in it. Double strain the cocktail into the glass. Spritz the cocktail with both of the twists. Make sure to release all the essential oils into the cocktail. Discard the twists.
Muddled ginger root. Shaken, served up, cinnamon stick and apple to garnish.
Add all ingredients into shaking tin. Add ice cubes to tin. Shake vigorously and strain into coupe. Garnish with Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.
Put 3 ounces of peach juice, 1 1/2 ounces of Ypiòca, 1 1/2 ounces of condensed milk and 1 tablespoon of sugar in a shaker. Add ice cubes, shake well and serve.

Combine all ingredients except the bitters and dry shake. Add ice and shake again. Strain over fresh ice into a double old fashioned glass. Dash bitters over the top of the cocktail. Garnish with a dried peach and a piece of candied ginger.

In a Boston shaker combine and muddle the fresh lemon juice and cranberries. Add the remaining liquid ingredients except the club soda with hard ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds pour directly into a highball add a little more ice to fill the glass and top with the club soda. Garnish with a few pear slices and fresh cranberries.

preparationDE: Schütteln, abseihen, auffüllen, Cocktailglas.
preparationEN: Shake, strain, up, cocktail glass
preparationIT: Agitare, filtrare, su un bicchiere da cocktail

preparationDE: Schütteln Sie gemischten Scotch, Zitronensaft, Honigsirup und Ingwersirup mit Eis. Über großes Eis in gekühltem Rocks Glas abseihen. Geben Sie rauchigen Scotch darauf (verwenden Sie unbedingt einen rauchigen Scotch wie z.B. Islay Single Malt). Mit kandiertem Ingwer garnieren.
preparationEN: Shake blended Scotch, lemon juice, honey syrup and ginger syrup with ice. Strain over large ice in chilled rocks glass. Float smoky Scotch on top (be sure to use a smoky Scotch such as an Islay single malt). Garnish with candied ginger.
preparationIT: Shakerare Scotch Blended, succo di limone, sciroppo di miele e sciroppo di zenzero con ghiaccio.  Filtrare con del ghiaccio in un bicchiere freddo.  Versa sopra il bicchiere uno scotch fumoso (assicurati di usare uno scotch affumicato come un single malt di Islay).  Guarnire con lo zenzero candito.

preparationEN: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass over an ice sphere(if available) then strain and serve into a chilled cocktail glass filled with the same ice sphere. Garnish with lemon balm and grapefruit peel.
Combine all ingredients in a shaker, except the apple cider. Shake vigorously. Strain over ice. Top with apple cider. Garnish with shaved cinnamon and nutmeg.

In the small tin of a Boston shaker set, combine the cilantro sprigs, thai chili, yuzu juice, simple syrup and a small piece of ice. Muddle these ingredients well. Add the remaining liquid ingredients to the shaker with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds.  Double strain the cocktail over ice into a 13 oz. rocks glass.  Garnish with the Thai chili piece and the cilantro sprig.
Shake vigorously. Strain into highball glass. Top with Ale. Grated nutmeg.
Combine ingredients into a mixing glass, add ice and shake until properly diluted. Double strain into a glass over fresh ice, garnish with a cucumber wheel.
Stir and garnish lemon peel.

preparationDE: Mit zerstoßenem Eis im Mixer mischen, bis es glatt ist. In ein gekühltes Glas geben, garnieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare con ghiaccio tritato in un frullatore fino a che liscio.  Versare in un bicchiere freddo, guarnire e servire.

preparationEN: Place the lime wedges and pinapple in a tumbler glass with gomme syrup and muddle briskly, then add ice and Amaretto. Stir well and serve with a float of Pisco.
Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

preparationDE: Alles in einen Mixer geben und aufschlagen.
preparationEN: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.
preparationIT: Getta tutto in un frullatore e liquida.

preparationEN: Rub the rim of each glass with lime slice and dip into salt.  Add ice, tequila, grapefruit juice, lime juice and top with pineapple soda.  Give it a quick stir.  Garnish with fresh pineapple or lime.
preparationIT: Strofina il bordo di ogni bicchiere con uno spicchio di lime e salalo.  Aggiungi ghiaccio, tequila, succo di pompelmo, succo di lime e aggiungi la soda all'ananas.  Dagli una rapida mescolata.  Guarnire con ananas fresco o lime.

preparationEN: Combine the Pink Pigeon, the cola, and the lime juice, in a tall Collins glass full of ice cubes.
Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail or Collins glass.

preparationDE: Den Bitter in ein Weinglas gießen. Das Glas umrühren, um die Innenseite mit dem Bitter zu überziehen, den Überschuss ausschütten. Gießen Sie den Gin in das Glas. Füge kein Eis hinzu.
preparationEN: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.
preparationIT: Distribuire nei bicchieri i cubetti di ghiaccio, i lamponi, il pepe e il gin e versare l’acqua tonica.

preparationEN: Combine the Pink Pigeon, the ginger beer, and the lime juice, in a tall Collins glass full of ice cubes.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationEN: To make simple syrup, mix equal parts hot water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Place mint in bottom of glass. Add ice and remaining ingredients except club soda then stir. Top with club soda and garnish with a mint sprig.
Slowly shake in a shaker with ice, strain into a square whiskey glass. Top with fresh ice. Add the blackberries to garnish. Add flowers and a green leaf for a special look!

preparationDE: Gut schütteln
preparationEN: Shake well
preparationIT: Versa in un bicchiere tutti gli ingredienti. Agitare bene

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in die Schüssel geben und gleichmäßig rühren.
preparationEN: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently
preparationIT: mescolare tutti gli ingredienti nella ciotola, tenere la bevanda sempre fredda, mescolare spesso

preparationEN: Build in a large pitcher or punchbowl. Combine Pink Pigeon Rum, juice from 2 lemons and agave. Blend 7 oz. of fresh watermelon in a blender and puree to mixture. Add a generous amount of ice and stir. Top with ginger beer. Ladle or pour into coupe glasses.
Mix all ingredients in a large pitcher, add ice, and enjoy!

Brown sugar cube soaked in Peychaud’s Bitters. Put soaked sugar cube in glass first. Pour .75 oz Pink Pigeon rum into flute over sugar cube. Fill remainder of the glass with champagne. Garnish with lemon twist.

notes: The original SF Pisco Punch recipe from the 1800s is made with a pisco from Italia grapes known as “Rosa del Peru”.
preparationEN: Add all liquid ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into an ice filled white wine glass. Garnish by adding pineapple chunks and Luxardo Cherry.
Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a coupe glass. Nutmeg on top for garnish.

drinkName: Pisco Punch (Adaptation by The Comstock Saloon)
notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
preparationEN: Shake, strain into a chilled flip glass with one cube. Garnish with lemon peel.

preparationDE: Den Inhalt in einem Cocktailshaker mit Eiswürfeln kräftig schütteln und abseihen, dann in ein Glas gießen und mit Bitter garnieren.
preparationEN: Vigorously shake and strain contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then pour into glass and garnish with bitters.
preparationIT: Shakerare vigorosamente e filtrare il contenuto in uno shaker con cubetti di ghiaccio, quindi versare in un bicchiere e guarnire con bitter.

notes: When grinding pistachios add a tiny pinch of coffee powder and salt.
preparationEN: Shake ingredients with ice then strain into a cocktail glass previously swirled with chocolate syrup and rimmed with ground pistachios.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten, außer den Bitterstoffen, in einen mit Eis gefüllten Shaker geben. Gut schütteln. In ein großes, mit Eis gefülltes Glas gießen. Füge Angostura-Bitter hinzu, "on top". Mit Cocktailkirsche und Ananas garnieren.
preparationEN: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti, in uno shaker pieno di ghiaccio.  Agitare bene.  Versare in un bicchiere capiente, pieno di ghiaccio.  Guarnire con ananas.

preparationEN: Dry shake, strain, top with porter.
Stir over 1 large rock. Garnish with zest of an orange peel.
Stir and strain. Hoshizaki ice.
Shake all ingredients with lots of ice. Strain into serving glass. Top off with a splash of club soda.

preparationDE: Serviert über Eis in einem hohen Glas mit einer entsteinten Kirsche (kann mehr entsteinte Kirschen hinzufügen, wenn sie in der Stimmung sind)!
preparationEN: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!
preparationIT: Servito con ghiaccio in un bicchiere alto con una ciliegia snocciolata (puoi aggiungere più ciliegie snocciolata se ne hai voglia)!

preparationDE: Die Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationDE: Vorsichtig in ein Pousse-Café-Glas gießen, damit die Creme de Menthe auf Grenadine schwimmt. Ohne zu mischen servieren.
preparationEN: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.
preparationIT: Versare con cura in un bicchiere pousse-cafè, in modo che la crema di menta galleggi sulla granatina. Servire senza mescolare.

preparationDE: Die Zutaten in einem Mixer mit Eis verrühren. In ein Glas abseihen, garnieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare gli ingredienti insieme in un mixer con ghiaccio.  Filtrare nel bicchiere, guarnire e servire.

preparationDE: Zutaten mit Eis verrühren, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Muskatnuss) mit Eis schütteln und in ein Whiskey-Sourglas abseihen. Muskatnuss darüber streuen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la noce moscata) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere da whisky sour. Cospargere di noce moscata e servire.

preparationEN: For punch, combine Ypioca, Lillet Rose, guava nectar, lime and agave. Top with Rosa Regale sparkling and add sliced strawberries and thin-sliced lime wheels to float as garnish.  For individual cocktails, muddle 2-3 strawberry slices w/ agave and add Ypioca, guava and Lillet. Add ice and shake to chill/mix. Strain over ice and top with champagne. Garnish with thin-sliced strawberry. Remember, this is an aperitif style so it's meant to be refreshing but not necessarily sweet.
Shake everything but soda water. Strain into a bamboo highball, add soda water, add ice, garnish with a basil leaf.
Mint salt on the rim. Garnish with mint sprig.
Shake and strain into a martini glass, spray some absinthe on the glass.
Build in collins glass. Top with soda. Orange peel.
Pour the liquor ingredients over ice and top with half inch (about one centimeter) layer of lightly whipped cream shaken with Hum Liqueur.
Shake all ingredients well in cocktail shaker. Strain into chilled martini glass or cocktail coupe.

notes: This cocktail is nice to serve with a little bowl of toasted and salted pumpkin seeds.
preparationEN: In a Boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients except the ginger beer. Shake vigorously for 25 seconds and strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass. Top with the ginger beer and grate the fresh nutmeg over the top.  *Oatmeal-Infused Karlsson's Gold Vodka: -- 750 ml Karlsson's Gold Vodka -- 2 C Raw Oats  Using a large sauté pan toast the oats for about 10 minutes constantly watching them and making sure they don't burn. Once aromatic and have a touch of color add the oats to a mason jar with the vodka and let infuse for 12-24 hours. Strain and press out all the vodka from the oats. Return the liquid to the bottle and store in a cool dark place.
Shake. Double strain. King cube. Orange peel garnish
Mix up all ingredients with a cocktail stirrer and serve with crushed ice with mint and edible flour if available.
preparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti con un agitatore per cocktail e servire con ghiaccio tritato con menta e farina commestibile se disponibile.

preparationDE: Mit Eis schütteln.
preparationEN: Shake with ice.
preparationIT: Shakerare con ghiaccio.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis verrühren, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationDE: Rotwein und Grenadine in ein Collins-Glas über Eiswürfel gießen. Mit Zitronen-Limetten-Soda auffüllen, umrühren und servieren.
preparationEN: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.
preparationIT: Versare il vino rosso e la granatina in un bicchiere Collins sopra i cubetti di ghiaccio.Riempi con la soda al limone e lime, mescola e servi.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis verrühren, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, Rum, Kahlua und Sahne mischen. Gut schütteln. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen und mit der Muskatnuss garnieren.
preparationEN: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.
preparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire il rum, il Kahlua e la panna. Filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e guarnire con la noce moscata. Agitare bene.

preparationDE: Einfach den Orangensaft zugeben und ganz schnell gießen, um den Sambucca mit dem Orangensaft zu mischen. Der Saft MUSS Fruchtfleisch enthalten!
preparationEN: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!
preparationIT: Basta aggiungere il succo d'arancia, abbastanza veloce per amalgamare la sambuca con il succo d'arancia.  Il succo deve avere polpa di frutta!

preparationDE: In einem Schnapsglas zuerst 1/3 Kahlua geben. Dann 1/3 Miduri, ergänzt durch 1/3 Bailey's irish Cream.
preparationEN: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream
preparationIT: In un bicchierino aggiungere prima 1/3 di Kahlua.  Quindi 1/3 di Midori, completando con 1/3 di crema irlandese di bailey

preparationEN: Combine ingredients in mixing glass, and stir with ice to dilution. Strain into a coupe cocktail glass. Garnish with a trimmed carrot ribbon.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einem sehr hohen Glas über Eis gießen. Vorsichtig nippen.
preparationEN: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti sul ghiaccio in un bicchiere molto alto.  Sorseggia con cautela.

preparationDE: Bier in einen großen Becher gießen, langsam den 7-up (oder Sprite) hinzufügen.
preparationEN: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).
preparationIT: Versare la birra in una tazza grande, aggiungere lentamente il 7up (o Sprite).

preparationDE: Zuckersirup mit Zitronensaft in einem hohen Glas mischen. Mit Ginger Ale auffüllen.
preparationEN: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.
preparationIT: Mescolare lo sciroppo di zucchero con il succo di limone in un bicchiere alto.Riempi di ginger ale.

preparationEN: Place all ingredients in a mixing tin, muddle fresh raspberries, add ice and shake until tin is frosty. Strain into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with orange wedge.

preparationDE: Geben Sie den Himbeer-Wodka und das Soda in ein Highball-Glas, das fast mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist. Gut umrühren.
preparationEN: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.
preparationIT: Versare la vodka ai lamponi e la soda in un bicchiere highball quasi pieno di cubetti di ghiaccio.  Mescolare bene.

preparationEN: Softly muddle the mint leaves and raspberry syrup in the bottom of the cup. Add crushed ice and Bourbon to the cup and then stir. Top with more ice, garnish with a mint sprig.
preparationIT: Pestare delicatamente le foglie di menta e lo sciroppo di lamponi sul fondo della tazza. Aggiungere il ghiaccio tritato e il Bourbon nella tazza e poi mescolare. Completare con altro ghiaccio, guarnire con un rametto di menta.

notes: Recipe Credit: Jennifer Costello, Charles Lintott & Sarah Holmes
preparationEN: Pour into shaker over ice and shake well. Serve straight up in a martini glass with an orange twist.
Shake with ice, strain and pour into a chilled martini glass.
Blend with ice.

preparationDE: Jeweils ein Shot, schütteln und schießen.
preparationEN: One shot each, shake n shoot
preparationIT: Versa in un bicchiere tutti gli ingredienti. Mescolare.

preparationEN: Muddle strawberries in a shaker with agave nectar, add lime juice, hibiscus tea, and Chinaco Blanco. Top with sparkling water.
Pour ingredients into mug, fill with ice. top with ginger ale. Roll into tin. Roll back into mug. Garnish.
Serve in an old fashioned glass over a large ice cube.
Add all ingredients except the champagne to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a martini glass. Fill with champagne and garnish with a flamed orange peel.

notes: http://www.saveur.com/roasted-cherries-recipe
preparationEN: In a blender, combine white rum, Luxardo, coconut milk, lime juice, sugar, bitters, 3 cherries, and 1 cup ice and purée until smooth; pour into a tiki glass and top with black rum. Place halved cherry, cut-side up, on top of cocktail and fill with Everclear before lighting cherry on fire.

notes: Root-Infused Karlsson's Gold Vodka:  Ingredients & Equipment - 5 750 ml. Bottles Karlsson's Gold Vodka - 5 oz. Sarsaparilla (Can be purchased at Kalustyan's) - 5 oz. Sassafras (Can be purchased at Kalustyan's) - 2.5 oz. White birch bark (Can be purchased at Kalustyan's) - 2.5 oz. Licorice root (Can be purchased at Kalustyan's) - 5 l. Barrel from Tuthilltown distillery - Spice grinder - Cheesecloth - 10 qt. Non-reactive sealable container - Fine mesh sieve  Instructions Soak the barrel in water for 24 hours to swell the wood staves and to seal the barrel. (If you put liquid into a dry barrel it will leak.) Rinse the sarsaparilla, sassafras, white birch bark and licorice root in cold water and lay out on parchment paper to dry. Once dry roughly grind the ingredients using a spice grinder and add them to a 10 qt. sealable non-reactive container. Pour the vodka into the container (reserve the bottles), cover and let infuse for 6 hours shaking every hour. Once fully infused strain out the roots and barks out using a fine mesh sieve and cheesecloth. Using a funnel fill the barrel with the infusion and plug the barrel. Let infuse for 1-2 months tasting until desired oak flavor is achieved. Note: The barrel can be used several times but the aging time will take longer the more you use it. For example the second time you might need to age it for 2-3 months. Once desired oak age is achieved remove the infusion from the barrel and pour it back into the bottles There will be less then what you started with due to evaporation and soaking. Use as a base for cocktails. It makes an interesting old-fashioned.
preparationEN: In a Boston shaker combine all liquid ingredients except the ginger beer with whole hard ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Double strain the cocktail over whole hard ice cubes in a 13 oz. rocks glass and top with the ginger beer. Garnish with the licorice root.

preparationDE: In einem Cocktailshaker vermengen und dann in ein gekühltes Glas abseihen. Garnieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare insieme in uno shaker, quindi filtrare in un bicchiere freddo.  Guarnire e servire.

preparationDE: Fügen Sie den Bombay Saphir, Blauen Curacao, Rosmarinzweig und den sanft ausgedrückten Zitronenkeil in ein Ballonglas ein. Gut mischen. Mit Eiswürfel füllen und mit dem Fever-Tree Light Tonic Water auffüllen. Vorsichtig mit einem Barlöffel zum Mischen verrühren.
preparationEN: 1) Add the Bombay Sapphire, Blue Curacao, rosemary sprig and gently squeezed lemon wedge to a balloon glass. Swirl well to combine.  2) Fill with cubed ice and top with the Fever-Tree Light Tonic Water.  3) Gently fold with a bar spoon to mix.
preparationIT: 1) Aggiungere il Bombay Sapphire, il Blue Curacao, il rametto di rosmarino e uno spicchio di limone leggermente spremuto in un bicchiere a palloncino.  Agita bene per combinare.  2) Riempire con ghiaccio a cubetti e ricoprire con l'acqua tonica Fever-Tree Light.  3) Piegare delicatamente con un cucchiaio da bar per mescolare.

preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in a wine glass, stir to mix. Add ice and enjoy.   Convert ounces to cups to make a larger pitcher for you and your guests.
Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker and shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over crushed ice with a mint sprig garnish.
Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.
Combine all ingredients except soda in a shaker with ice, shake to combine. Pour into a coupe glass and garnish with a lemon peel.

preparationDE: In einem Schnapsglas die Crown Royal auf den Frangelico schichten.
preparationEN: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.
preparationIT: In un bicchiere da shot versa a strati prima il Frangelico e infine il Crown Royal

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Cola) mit Eis schütteln und in ein gekühltes Collins-Glas abseihen. Mit Cola auffüllen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la cola) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere collins freddo. Riempi con cola e servi

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten über Eis in den Becher gießen. In ein Glas abseihen.
preparationEN: Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice. Strain into glass.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti nel tumbler sul ghiaccio. Filtrare nel bicchiere.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser) mit Eis schütteln und über zwei Eiswürfel in ein Highball-Glas sieben. Mit kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser auffüllen, umrühren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (eccetto l'acqua gassata) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere highball su due cubetti di ghiaccio. Riempi con acqua gassata, mescola e servi

preparationDE: Gießen Sie Gin und Cranberry in einen mit Eiswürfeln gefüllten Highball. Grenadine zugeben und umrühren.
preparationEN: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.
preparationIT: Versa gin e mirtilli rossi in un highball pieno di cubetti di ghiaccio.  Aggiungere la granatina e mescolare.

preparationEN: Combine all ingredients and stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into coupe glass and garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

preparationDE: In einem old-fashioned Glas den Zucker in der Soda auflösen. Füge zerstoßenes Eis hinzu, bis das Glas fast voll ist. Den Rum hinzufügen. Gut umrühren. Mit der Kirsche und den Orangen- und Zitronenscheiben garnieren.
preparationEN: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.
preparationIT: In un bicchiere vecchio stile, sciogli lo zucchero nella soda club. Aggiungere il ghiaccio tritato fino a quando il bicchiere è quasi pieno. Aggiungi il rum. Guarnire con la ciliegia e le fettine di arancia e limone. Mescolare bene.

preparationDE: Den Rum und das Soda in ein Collins-Glas gießen, das fast mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist. Gut umrühren und mit dem Zitronenkeil garnieren.
preparationEN: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.
preparationIT: Versare il rum e la soda in un bicchiere Collins quasi pieno di cubetti di ghiaccio. Mescolate bene e guarnite con lo spicchio di limone

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Muskatnuss) mit Eis schütteln und in ein Collins-Glas abseihen. Muskatnuss darüber streuen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la noce moscata) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere Collins. Cospargere di noce moscata e servire.

preparationDE: Puderzucker, Wasser und Bitter in einem old-fashioned Glas verrühren. Wenn sich der Zucker aufgelöst hat, Eiswürfel und leichten Rum hinzufügen. Die Limettenspirale hinzufügen, 151er Rum darauf verteilen und servieren.
preparationEN: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare lo zucchero, l'acqua e il bitter in un bicchiere vecchio stile. Quando lo zucchero si sarà sciolto aggiungere i cubetti di ghiaccio e il rum chiaro. Aggiungere la scorza di lime, far galleggiare sopra 151 rum e servire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einer Bowle mischen und servieren.
preparationEN: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti in una ciotola da punch e servire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einem Glas mischen und Eis hinzufügen.
preparationEN: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.
preparationIT: Versare gli ingredienti sul ghiaccio e mescolare.

preparationDE: Gießen Sie Rum in ein Highball-Glas über Eiswürfel. Orangensaft hinzufügen, umrühren und servieren.
preparationEN: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.
preparationIT: Versare il rum in un bicchiere highball sopra i cubetti di ghiaccio. Aggiungere il succo d'arancia, mescolare e servire.

preparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, Rum, Zitronensaft und Zucker vermengen. Gut schütteln. In ein Sourglas abseihen und mit der Orangenscheibe und der Kirsche garnieren.
preparationEN: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.
preparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire il rum, il succo di limone e lo zucchero. Agitare bene. Filtrare in un bicchiere sour e guarnire con la fetta d'arancia e la ciliegia.

preparationDE: Puderzucker in Wasser in einem old-fashioned Glas auflösen. Rum und einen Eiswürfel dazugeben und umrühren. Die Zitronenschale hinzufügen und servieren.
preparationEN: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
preparationIT: Sciogliere lo zucchero in acqua in un bicchiere vecchio stile. Aggiungere il rum e un cubetto di ghiaccio e mescolare. Aggiungere la scorza di limone e servire

preparationDE: Die Zutaten in ein Highball-Glas geben und mit Sekt auffüllen.
preparationEN: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine.
preparationIT: Versare gli ingredienti in un bicchiere highball, guarnire con dello spumante.

preparationDE: Gießen Sie den Scotch und die Drambuie in ein old-fashioned Glas, das fast mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist. Gut umrühren. Mit der Zitronenscheibe garnieren.
preparationEN: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.
preparationIT: Versare lo Scotch e il Drambuie in un bicchiere vecchio stile quasi riempito di cubetti di ghiaccio. Guarnire con la scorza di limone. Mescolare bene.

preparationEN: Add ingredients to a mug and stir.  *Honey-Ginger Syrup: Combine 1 part ginger with 2 parts honey and 1 cup of water and boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 mins. Strain and discard solids.  **Ghost-Pepper-Infused Campari: Soak 1 ghost pepper in a 16 oz. bottle of Campari for up to 24 hrs (reduce infusion time to reduce heat).  ***Cinnamon Tincture: Soak 3 cinnamon sticks in 16 oz. of any neutral grain alcohol that is high proof (regular 80-proof vodka is great) for up to 14 days. Strain and discard the sticks.
Muddle sage and Thyme. Stirred, over ice in single rocks glass. Burnt orange, and thyme sprig to garnish.
Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Muddle the sage in a mixing tin. Add the remaining ingredients and dry shake (no ice) for 15 seconds. Add ice and shake another 15 seconds to chill down the drink. Double strain into a large coupe glass. Garnish with a whole star anise floated in the middle of the egg white.  *Honey Cinnamon Syrup: -- 16 oz Honey -- 2 Cinnamon Sticks -- 8 oz Water Combine all the ingredients together in a pot. Place on the stove and bring to a simmer, stirring the honey so it doesn’t burn and let the pot simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat and place on an ice bath. Place in a container and label and date it. Store in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and then stir. Strain into a Nick & Nora glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten über Eiswürfel in ein Highball-Glas gießen. Gut umrühren und servieren. (Wodka kann durch Gin ersetzt werden, wenn gewünscht.)
preparationEN: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti sui cubetti di ghiaccio in un bicchiere highball.Mescolate bene e servite.(La vodka può essere sostituita al gin, se si preferisce.)

notes: Play around with different kinds of salt. The salty swede uses yuzu salt.
preparationEN: Combine the Karlsson's Gold Vodka and grapefruit in a shaker with ice. Shake for 15 seconds and strain over fresh ice in an old-fashioned glass that has a salted rim. Top the cocktail with the club soda.

preparationDE: Nimm ein hohes Glas und lege ein paar Eiswürfel hinein, fülle den Wodka darüber und fülle ihn mit Saft, dann die "Creme", um die Grenadine einzufüllen, aber sehr vorsichtig an der Seite des Glases, damit sie sich am Boden niederlässt. Garniere mit Orange und Erdbeere.
preparationEN: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.
preparationIT: Prendete un bicchiere alto e mettete qualche cubetto di ghiaccio, riempiteci sopra la vodka e riempite con il succo poi la "crema", per finire riempite la granatina ma con molta attenzione a lato del bicchiere in modo che si adagi sul fondo .  Guarnire con arancia e fragola.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and double strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with nutmeg.  *Winter Spice Brown Sugar Syrup:  -- 2 qt Brown Sugar -- 2 qt Water -- 3 Tbsp Ground Ginger -- 3 Tbsp Ground Nutmeg -- 1 Tbsp Clove  Heat and simmer the below ingredients in a medium pot for 15 minutes. Strain with cheesecloth.

Add all ingredients to tin and dry shake. Add ice and vigorously shake for 12 seconds. Fine strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish by sprinkling matcha powder (.25 tsp).   *Rich Simple Syrup:  -- 2 cups Granulated Sugar -- 1 cup Water  Combine sugar and water in a small saucepan over medium heat and stir until sugar dissolves. Remove from heat, let cool to room temperature and transfer to a clean glass jar. Cover and keep refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.

Combine Hophead, lemon juice, King's Ginger, honey syrup, egg white, and bitters in a shaker and dry shake to emulsify egg whites. Add ice and shake vigorously until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled fizz glass. Empty ice out of shakers and fill shaker with ale to create a froth. Pour this froth over the drink and garnish with half an orange wheel.
Pour over ice in a pint glass, then fill with steam beer. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a straw.

preparationDE: Alles in einem Krug vermischen und im Kühlschrank aufbewahren. Nach Belieben Nelken und Zimtstangen hinzufügen. In Weingläsern servieren.
preparationEN: Mix all together in a pitcher and refrigerate. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste. Serve in wine glasses.
preparationIT: Mescolare il tutto in una brocca e conservare in frigorifero.  Aggiungere i chiodi di garofano e le stecche di cannella a piacere.  Servire in calici da vino.

notes: Featured on NBC New York on 3.13.2016 (nbcnewyork.com)
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients very well with ice and strain over ice into a highball glass.

preparationDE: Ein gekühltes old-fashioned Glas mit dem Absinth ausspülen, zerstoßenes Eis hinzufügen und beiseite stellen. Die restlichen Zutaten über das Eis geben und beiseite stellen. Entsorgen Sie das Eis und den überschüssigen Absinth aus dem vorbereiteten Glas und seihen Sie das Getränk in das Glas. Die Zitronenschale als Garnierung hinzufügen.
preparationEN: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.
preparationIT: Sciacquare un bicchiere vecchio stile freddo con l'assenzio, aggiungere il ghiaccio tritato e metterlo da parte. Mescola gli ingredienti rimanenti sul ghiaccio e mettilo da parte. Togli il ghiaccio e l'assenzio in eccesso dal bicchiere precedentemente preparato e filtra la bevanda nel bicchiere .Aggiungere la scorza di limone per guarnire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten gut mit gebrochenem Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare bene tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio tritato, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
