preparationEN: Stir, strain into a chilled Nick and Nora glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

preparationDE: Scotch, Limettensaft und Puderzucker mit Eis schütteln und in ein Whiskey-Sourglas abseihen. Mit 1/2 Scheibe Zitrone dekorieren, mit der Kirsche belegen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare scotch, succo di lime e zucchero a velo con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere da whisky sour. Decorare con 1/2 fetta di limone, guarnire con la ciliegia e servire.

preparationDE: In einem Highball-Glas mit Eis mischen. Garnieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.
preparationIT: Mescolare in un bicchiere highball con ghiaccio. Guarnire e servire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einem mit Eis gefüllten Highball-Glas vermengen. Mit Limettenkeil garnieren.
preparationEN: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.
preparationIT: Metti tutti gli ingredienti in un bicchiere highball pieno di ghiaccio.  Guarnire con uno spicchio di lime.

preparationEN: Combine bourbon, lemon juice, and syrup in a shaker and add cold ice. Shake until chilled well (10-30 sec. depending on the quality of the ice). Strain into a collins glass and slowly pour the vermouth into the glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.   *Orange-scented Maple Syrup: combine 6 oz. of grade B maple syrup, 6 oz. filtered water and the peel of 1 orange, with a minimum amount of pith in a non-reactive pan.  Simmer for 10 mins. Remove from heat and allow it to cool to room temp. before using.  Syrup will keep for 1 month if refrigerated.

Rinse the glass with Orange Blossom Water and pour cocktail. Shake Egg White, Sauternes and Lemon Juice vigorously dry for 25 seconds, then add ice, gin, Luxardo Bitter Bianco and Lillet Blanc, shake again for 10 seconds. Strain into Nick & Nora, garnish with a lemon wheel.

notes: *Diluted 2:1 water
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in a tall glass.
Combine all ingredients in shaker. Dry shake for 10 seconds, add ice and shake for 30 seconds. Strain into small tumbler. Garnish with a sprinkle of grated nutmeg.
Combine ingredients in a pint glass, stir with ice to chill. Double strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with mint and lemon wedge flag.

preparationDE: Limonade und Wasser nach Anleitung auf dem Dosenrücken mischen. Wenn die Anweisungen besagen, 4 1/3 Dosen Wasser hinzuzufügen, tun Sie dies. In den Krug mischen. Füge 1 1/2 Tasse Wodka (Absolut) hinzu. Gut mischen. In ein Glas zerstoßenes Eis gießen. Ausgezeichnet!
preparationEN: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!
preparationIT: Mescola la limonata e l'acqua.  Aggiungi 1 tazza e mezza di Vodka (Absolut).  Mescolare bene.  Versare in un bicchiere di ghiaccio tritato.

preparationDE: Sherry, Puderzucker und Ei mit Eis schütteln und in ein Collins-Glas abseihen. Mit Milch füllen und umrühren. Muskatnuss darüber streuen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare lo sherry, lo zucchero a velo e l'uovo con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere Collins.Riempi di latte e mescola.Cospargere di noce moscata e servire.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Muskatnuss) mit Eis schütteln und in ein Whiskey-Sourglas abseihen. Muskatnuss darüber streuen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la noce moscata) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere da whisky sour. Cospargere di noce moscata e servire.

preparationEN: Build all ingredients in a punch bowl and add ice, stir gently. Garnish with seasonal fruit and citrus wheels.
Build & Stir. Hoshizaki Ice.

preparationDE: Gießen Sie ein Teil Jack Daniels und ein Teil Jim Beam in ein Schnapsglas und lassen Sie Wild Turkey darauf treiben.
preparationEN: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.
preparationIT: Versare una parte di Jack Daniels e una parte diJim Beam nel bicchierino da shot, infine versare il Wild Turkey.

preparationEN: Combine Luxardo, BarSol, and tincture. Ice, stir, and strain into chilled coupe. Top with Prosecco. Gently set candied blood orange wheel (thinly sliced) garnish into drink and serve.  *Castillian Tincture: -- 750 ml Luxardo Grappa Euganea -- 20 g Sliced Blanched Almond -- 2 g Spanish Saffron -- 3 Sliced Madagascan Vanilla Beans -- 3 g Toasted Green Cardamom -- 4 Lemon Peels (pith removed) -- 2 Quartered Dried Pajarero Figs -- 2 Quartered Quartered Medjool Dates  Combine all ingredients, gently agitate twice daily for 14 days. Fine filter and store.  **Candied Blood Orange Wheels: -- 1 Blood Orange (sliced thin - approx. 10 slices/orange) -- .5 c Natural Sugar -- .25 c Water -- 2 Tbsp Corn Syrup  Combine sugar, water, and corn syrup in shallow saucepan. Slow simmer on low heat approx. 10 min. When thickened mixture begins to cling to sides of pan, add orange slices. Allow to simmer for 5 more min. and remove from hardening syrup. Place slices on parchment-lined oven rack. Air dry overnight, then bake 10 min. at 400°F (or dehydrate them).

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einen mit Eis gefüllten Cocktailshaker geben. Gut schütteln und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
preparationEN: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in uno shaker pieno di ghiaccio.Shakerare bene e filtrare nella coppetta da cocktail.

preparationEN: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.
Pour Perfecto Amor over ice and garnish with an orange wheel.
Shake ingredients with ice then strain into an ice-filled collins or pilsner glass.
Stir for about 20 seconds with ice and then Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.

Shake rye, rum, lemonade, and ginger liqueur. Strain over fresh ice in a copper mug. Top with Abita Big Easy IPA (or similar session IPA). Gently stir.  *Basic House Lemonade: -- 2 parts Water -- 1 part Sugar -- 1 part Lemon Juice
Steam in steaming tin. Pour in Demitasse glass. Top with heavy whipping cream and nutmeg.
Shake ingredients with ice then strain into a Collins glass.

preparationDE: Schütte alles zusammen und serviere es kalt.
preparationEN: Throw it all together and serve real cold.
preparationIT: Metti tutto insieme e servi freddo.

preparationDE: Einen Eiswürfel in das Glas geben und 4,5 cl. Advocaat hinzufügen. Das Glas mit Limonade füllen und mit einer Scheibe Zitrone dekorieren. Sofort servieren.
preparationEN: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.
preparationIT: Riempite il bicchiere con la limonata e decorate con una fetta di limone.

preparationEN: Combine all ingredients besides beer and bitters and dry shake without ice. Add ice and re-shake, double strain into a fizz glass and top with beer. Garnish with shaved nutmeg and 3 drops of bitters.
Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice. Express orange peel over drink and garnish.
preparationIT: Mescola tutti gli ingredienti con il ghiaccio. Filtrare in un bicchiere con dei cubetti di ghiaccio. Spremi la scorza d'arancia sulla bevanda e guarnire.

notes: Shake the bottle containing the mixture before serving.
preparationEN: Use an empty bottle of 750ml capacity and combine together 12 ounces - 360 ml of each of the two liqueurs and store in the freezer. Serve very cold in a small cordial glass without ice.
Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.

preparationDE: Die Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Brandyglas abseihen und servieren. (Die englische Übersetzung des Namens dieses Getränks lautet "Sonne und Schatten", und nachdem Sie dieses Getränk probiert haben, werden Sie verstehen, warum. Danke, Kirby.)
preparationEN: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)
preparationIT: Shakerare gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in un bicchierino di brandy e servire.

preparationEN: Pour 2 oz. of Club Soda into a Collin’s Glass. Hard shake first fIve ingredients with ice for at 20 seconds. Slowly strain into the Collins glass. Garnish with an orange wedge.
Place the thyme in a tumbler glass and muddle to release the oils, then add ice and ingredients, stir well and serve.

notes: Adapted from Francesco Lafranconi's recipe in the Luxardo cocktail book. He originally called for Luxardo Dry Gin, which we have replaced with No.3 London Dry Gin.
preparationEN: Pour all ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Serve on one big rock.

preparationDE: Füllen Sie das Glas mit Eis und fügen Sie Spritzer von Bacardi und Malibu hinzu. Einen Spritzer Ananassaft dazugeben und mit Orangensaft auffüllen. Grenadine als Farbstoff beigeben und mit Kirschen garnieren.
preparationEN: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.
preparationIT: Riempi il bicchiere con ghiaccio e aggiungi in dei bicchieri un pò di Bacardi e Malibu.  Aggiungere una spruzzata di succo d'ananas e guarnire con succo d'arancia.  Aggiungere la granatina per colorare e guarnire con le ciliegie.

preparationEN: Add Junipero Gin and botanicals first. Add ice and follow with a bold tonic. Top with additional botanicals/garnish for presentation.  *Assorted Complementing Botanicals: Orange, Star Anise, Rose Petals, Italian Juniper

Combine all ingredients in a mixing tin. Shake and strain into a collins glass full of crushed ice. Garnish with apple slices.  *Chamomile Tea Syrup:  -- 2 c water -- 1 c chamomile flower -- 1 c sugar Bring 1 cup water to boil. Add 1 cup chamomile flower and 1 more cup of water, bring back to a boil. Add 1 cup sugar, bring to boil.  Let it rest. When cool, the syrup is ready.

Gently warm 60g golden caster sugar in a pan with 30ml water and 1 tbsp allspice. Cook gently until the sugar has dissolved, then leave the mixture to cool. Strain through a sieve lined with a coffee filter (or a double layer of kitchen paper).    Pour 60ml of the spiced syrup into a cocktail shaker along with 200ml rum and 90ml lime juice. Shake with ice and strain between six flute glasses. Top up with 600ml champagne and garnish each with an orange twist.
preparationIT: Scaldare delicatamente 60 g di zucchero di canna in una padella con 30 ml di acqua e 1 cucchiaio di pimento. Cuocere a fuoco lento finché lo zucchero non si sarà sciolto, quindi lasciare raffreddare il composto. Filtrare al setaccio rivestito con un filtro da caffè (o un doppio strato di carta da cucina) .  Versare 60 ml di sciroppo speziato in uno shaker insieme a 200 ml di rum e 90 ml di succo di lime. Shakerare con ghiaccio e filtrare tra sei bicchieri flute. Riempire con 600 ml di champagne e guarnire ciascuno con un tocco d'arancia.

preparationEN: Muddle pineapple and ginger root, lemon juice and simple syrup. Add rum. Shake well, over ice and top with ginger beer and Luxardo Bitter
shake/2strain/coupe  garnish lemon twist
Juice the ingredients and pour into a chilled glass (do not use ice or the drink will lose body).  Top with Pastis Prado or absinthe and garnish with a sprig of mint.
Combine all ingredients, minus the sparkling wine, into a tin. Shake and double strain into a flute glass. Top with a float of sparkling wine. Garnish with an edible flower petal.

preparationDE: Über Eis in Glas einfüllen, garnieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
preparationIT: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

preparationEN: *Pineapple Syrup: Equal parts pineapple blended with water and sugar and strained

preparationDE: In ein Mischglas mit Eis geben, umrühren und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Kann auch auf Eiswürfeln in einem Steinglas serviert werden.
preparationEN: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.
preparationIT: Versare in un mixing glass con ghiaccio, mescolare e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail.

preparationEN: Muddle raspberries in mixing glass. Add remainder of ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously strain over fresh ice. Garnish with raspberry and mint.

Muddle raspberries in mixing glass. Add remainder of ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a well chilled coupe. Top off with sparkling wine. Garnish with raspberry and mint.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein gekühltes Whiskey-Sourglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in un bicchiere ghiacciato di whisky sour e servire.

notes: Photo credit: Liquor.com
preparationEN: Rinse a rocks glass with eau de vie. Combine remaining ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake, and strain over fresh ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon pigtail.
Shake the ingredients with ice. Strain into an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

Muddle mint and cucumber with the simple syrup in a shaker tin. Combine the remainder of the ingredients in the tin. Shake vigorously. Double strain with a fine mesh strainer into a collins glass. Fill with ice and garnish with a cucumber slice.

In a Boston shaker, combine the Karlsson's and the lemon curd with whole hard ice and shake vigorously for 30-40 seconds. Add the champagne to the shaker, stir until mixed well and double strain the cocktail into a 4.5 oz. coupe glass. Garnish the cocktail with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils into the glass. Rub the entire rim with the twist before dropping the twist into the glass.
Stir. Strain. Lemon peel garnish.

notes: Vermouth: Vermouth, like wine goes bad if it has been open for a while. Also it's best to keep it in the refrigerator after it has been open to keep it fresh. Vermouth will last about 3-4 months. There are many producers of vermouth, all varying in style and flavor, so we would recommend trying a couple out and finding which you prefer. It's also fun to taste the difference. This goes for both dry (French) and sweet (Italian). Depending on the type you use, you might want to adjust the quantities used in your cocktail to your liking.  Apricot brandy: There are many brands out there. We like to use the Rothman & Winter. Unlike other fruit liqueurs that can be cloyingly sweet, the Rothman & Winter delivers a sweetness and bouquet expected when enjoying a fresh apricot.  This is a nice cocktail for vodka martini drinkers that want a little twist on their cocktail. It's essentially a perfect martini made with vodka and apricot brandy.
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in a frozen mixing glass with hard ice and stir for 20 seconds. Strain into a frozen coupe glass.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in den Mixer geben - abdecken und bei mittlerer Geschwindigkeit schaumig schlagen, bis sie gut vermischt sind. In ein großes, 2 mittlere oder 3 kleine Gläser füllen und geniessen.
preparationEN: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.
preparationIT: Mettere tutti gli ingredienti nella caraffa del frullatore - coprire e montare a velocità media fino a quando non sono ben amalgamati.Versare in un bicchiere alto, 2 medi o 3 piccoli e bere.

preparationDE: Den Zucker in heißem Wasser auflösen und abkühlen lassen. Die Zitrusfrüchte schälen und stückeln. Wein, Zuckersirup, Obst und Fresca in einem Krug mischen und für einige Stunden in den Kühlschrank stellen. In hohen Gläsern mit einem Strohhalm servieren.
preparationEN: Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool. Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours. Serve in tall glasses with a straw.
preparationIT: Sciogliere lo zucchero in acqua calda e raffreddare.  Pelare gli agrumi e spezzarli a spicchi.  Mescolare il vino, lo sciroppo di zucchero, la frutta e la Fresca in una caraffa e mettere in frigo per qualche ora.  Servire in bicchieri alti con una cannuccia.

preparationDE: Geben Sie 2 Spritzer Godiva Liquour in ein Glas, geben Sie so viel Milch hinzu, wie Sie möchten.
preparationEN: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.
preparationIT: Metti 2 shot di Godiva Liqueur in un bicchiere, aggiungi tanto o poco latte quanto desideri.

preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice and fine strain into Collins glass. Top with seltzer water and add lavender blossom garnish.

preparationDE: Füge deinen GM und dann deinen Kaffee hinzu.
preparationEN: Add your GM and then add your coffee.
preparationIT: Aggiungi il Grand Marnier e poi aggiungi il tuo caffè.

preparationEN: Served in v-shaped rocks glass with "vintage ice".

In a Boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Double strain into a frozen 4.5 oz. coupe glass. Garnish with 1/2 piece kaffir lime leaf. (Clap the leaf several times before placing on top of the cocktail to release the aromatics.)
Shake all ingredients except foam, strain into chilled cocktail "coupe". Layer foam onto cocktail. Add garnish.

notes: Featured in The King's Ginger Winter Warmer Program OND 2015
preparationEN: Soak 1 chai tea bag in half mug of hot water for 30 seconds, remove the tea bag, add all the ingredients, add more hot water.   Lemon wheel stuffed with 4-5 cloves for garnish.
Stir all ingredients except for Absinthe and Orange Flower. Strain over a chunk/sphere of ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint, with 3 drops of Orange Flower.

preparationDE: Mische Kaffee, Jack Daniels und Amaretto. Creme darauf geben.
preparationEN: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.
preparationIT: Mescola il caffè, Jack Daniels e Amaretto. Aggiungi la panna sopra.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Ginger Ale) mit Eis schütteln und in ein Collins-Glas über Eiswürfel abseihen. Mit Ginger Ale füllen, umrühren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (eccetto ginger ale) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere Collins con cubetti di ghiaccio.Riempi con ginger ale, mescola e servi.

preparationEN: Mix carefully to avoid releasing the dissolved CO2.
preparationIT: Mescolare accuratamente per evitare di rilasciare la CO2 disciolta.

preparationDE: Tequila, Zitronensaft und Puderzucker mit Eis schütteln und in ein Whiskey-Sourglas abseihen. Die halbe Zitronenscheibe dazugeben, mit der Kirsche garnieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare la tequila, il succo di limone e lo zucchero a velo con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere da whisky sour.Aggiungere la mezza fetta di limone, guarnire con la ciliegia e servire.

preparationEN: Pre-freeze pomegranate juice into one large cube. Rinse a glass with Montanaro vermouth. Dump any excess out. Build the remainder of spirits and bitters into a shaker tin. Shake vigorously. Strain over the pomegranate ice cube into a rocks glass.

preparationDE: Den Tequila und den Orangensaft in ein Glas über Eis gießen. Füge die Grenadine hinzu, die auf den Boden sinken wird. Rühren Sie sanft um, um den Sonnenaufgangseffekt zu erzeugen. Garnieren und servieren.
preparationEN: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect. Garnish and serve.
preparationIT: Versare la tequila e il succo d'arancia in un bicchiere con ghiaccio.  Aggiungere la granatina, che affonderà sul fondo.  Mescola delicatamente per creare l'effetto alba.  Guarnire e servire.

preparationDE: Füllen Sie das Schnapsglas mit Tequila. Füge Tropfen Tobasco-Sauce hinzu.
preparationEN: Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.
preparationIT: Riempi un bicchierino da shot con la tequila.  Aggiungere le gocce di salsa Tabasco.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mischen und gut schütteln. Zuerst süß, mit einem Biss am Ende.....
preparationEN: Mix all ingredients and Shake well. Sweet at first, with a BITE at the end...
preparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti e agitare bene.  Dolce all'inizio, con un morso alla fine.

preparationDE: Mit Eis mischen, bis es glatt ist. In einem Tulpenglas servieren, mit Schlagsahne bedecken.
preparationEN: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.
preparationIT: Frullare con ghiaccio fino a che liscio.  Servire in un bicchiere a tulipano, guarnire con panna montata.

preparationDE: Geben Sie den Kaffee und die Gewürze in den Filterkegel Ihrer Kaffeemaschine. Kaffee wie gewohnt zubereiten, abkühlen lassen. In einem hohen Glas 1 oder 2 Teelöffel Zucker in 2 Esslöffel Kaffee auflösen (es ist einfacher zu lösen, als wenn man ihn direkt auf Eis legt). Füge 5-6 Eiswürfel hinzu und gieße Kaffee 2-3cm von der Oberseite des Glases auf. Einen Löffel auf den Kaffee legen und langsam Schlagsahne in den Löffel geben. Dadurch wird die Creme auf dem Kaffee schweben, anstatt sich sofort darin zu verteilen.
preparationEN: Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker. Brew coffee as usual, let it cool. In a tall glass, dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice). Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass. Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon. This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away.
preparationIT: Metti il caffè e le spezie nel cono del filtro della tua caffettiera.  Prepara il caffè come al solito, lascialo raffreddare.  In un bicchiere alto, sciogli 1 o 2 cucchiaini di zucchero in 30gr di caffè (è più facile da sciogliere che se lo metti sul ghiaccio).  Aggiungere 5-6 cubetti di ghiaccio e versare il caffè a circa 1 pollice dalla parte superiore del bicchiere.  Appoggia un cucchiaio sopra il caffè e versa lentamente la panna montata nel cucchiaio.  In questo modo la crema galleggerà sul caffè anziché disperdersi subito.

preparationDE: Bereite eine Kanne Kaffee mit guter europäischer Stärke zu. In den gemahlenen Kaffee 2 oder 3 frisch gemahlene Kardamomschoten geben. Im heißen Zustand süßen, dann schnell abkühlen lassen. In einem Highball-Glas über Eis mit Sahne servieren. Um den Schichteffekt zu erzielen, legen Sie einen Löffel auf den Kaffee und gießen Sie die Milch vorsichtig in den Löffel, so dass sie auf dem Kaffee schwimmt.
preparationEN: Prepare a pot of coffee at a good European strength. In the ground coffee, add 2 or 3 freshly ground cardamom pods. Sweeten while hot, then cool quickly. Serve in highball glass over ice, with cream. To get the layered effect, place a spoon atop the coffee and pour the milk carefully into the spoon so that it floats on the top of the coffee.
preparationIT: Nel caffè macinato aggiungere 2 o 3 cialde di cardamomo appena macinate.  Dolcificare quando è caldo, quindi raffreddare rapidamente.  Servire in bicchiere highball con ghiaccio, con panna.  Per ottenere l'effetto a strati, posiziona un cucchiaio sopra il caffè e versa il latte con attenzione nel cucchiaio in modo che galleggi sulla parte superiore del caffè.

preparationDE: Kombiniere Thai-Tee (Pulver), kochendes Wasser und gesüßte Kondensmilch, rühr sie um, bis sie vermischt sind. In 2 große Gläser mit Eiswürfeln füllen. Mit Minzblättern garnieren. Ergibt 2 Portionen.
preparationEN: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.
preparationIT: Combina il tè tailandese (la polvere), l'acqua bollente e il latte condensato zuccherato, mescolare fino a quando non si saranno amalgamati.  Versare in 2 bicchieri alti pieni di cubetti di ghiaccio.  Guarnire con foglie di menta.  Per 2 porzioni.

preparationEN: Mix all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir for 15-20 secs depending on the type of ice. Strain over a large rock and garnish with an orange peel expressing the oils over the cocktail.  *Anchor Christmas Ale 2016 w/ Honey (reduction) 2:1 (2-parts Beer to 1-part Honey)

notes: Cocktail created by interior designer contest winner, Tineke Triggs.
preparationEN: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add all ingredients except the garnish and shake well. Stain into a very chilled martini glass (martini glass should have a sugar rim on half of the glass) and top with a splash of ginger beer. Garnish with a mint leaf and orange peel. Right before serving drop in a chip of dry ice for the mist.
Shake until very cold; double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. No garnish.
Stir ingredients in glass over an ice sphere.

notes: Published on Liquor.com 10.05.2015 http://liquor.com/recipes/the-bacchus
preparationEN: Place the Concord grapes and blackberries in a shaker and muddle. Add the rest of the ingredients and ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with Concord grapes and lemon peel twisted to release oils.
Build in glass. Add crushed ice and swizzle. Top with more crushed ice. Dash pepita tincture on top for aromatics. Garnish with lemon wheel and dried fig.
1st glass ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino, Acid Phosphate  2nd glass ingredients: BarSol Quebranta Pisco, Luxardo Amaro Abano, Luxardo Fernet, Scrappy's Aromatic Bitters
Add all ingredients to a shaker, add ice, shake and strain into a martini glass garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

Combine all ingredients in a shaking tin or mixing glass and vigorously shake without ice for 10 seconds. Add ice, and shake for another 8 seconds. Strain over larger ice cube or into a cocktail glass and add freshly grated cinnamon on top.  *Vanilla Syrup:  Split 1 vanilla pod lengthwise and scrape interior into a heavy sauce pan.  Add 2 c. raw sugar and 2 c. water. Bring to a simmer and reduce heat to low.  Cook for 5 mins and stir occasionally.  Remove from heat and keep unstrained for 24 hrs.  Strain through a cheese cloth and bottle. Keeps for 2 weeks.  **Coconut Cream: Combine 1 part Coco Lopez with 1 part rich coconut milk. Mix well.
Top with Fever-Tree Bitter Lemon. Build in a collins glass full of ice cubes and garnish with a lemon wheel and mint sprig.
Dry shake, then serve old-fashioned glass with crushed ice. Drizzle Bitter on top to finish.

Soak cube in 8 dashes Abbott's Bitter. Drop sugar cube into bottom of flute glass. Stir, Luxardo, gin, and pomegranate cordial. Strain into flute glass. Top with Brachetto. Garnish with small rose, dipped in rose flower water.  *Pomegranate Cordial: -- 48 oz Pomegranate Juice -- 2.5 lbs White Sugar -- 1 lb Turbinado Sugar -- 8 Course Cracked Black Peppercorns -- 2 Cloves -- 5 Allspice Berries -- 1 Tbsp Pomegranate Molasses -- 1 oz Orange Flower Water  Mix all ingredients together in large saucepan. Stir on medium heat until all sugar is dissolved. Strain of spices. Bottle.
Combine ingredients, stir until well chilled, and strain in to a cocktail glass. Serve with an orange twist.
Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a small wine or cocktail glass. Twist a slice of lemon peel over the drink and use as garnish.

Spray of Lemon Verbana oil on the Martini glass. Combine all other ingredients and dry shake for 20 seconds. Add ice to the mixing tin and shake again. Double strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with fresh lemon verbena. Served in a martini.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Stir the first three ingredients and the sea salt tincture over ice. Strain into a coupe glass and add licorice-infused Angostura Bitters. Garnish with 3 brandied cherries.
Stir, strain, and serve straight up.

notes: *Ice: Bar Ice & Vintage Ice
preparationEN: Combine rum, curacao, violettes, and lime juice in a shaker, add ice and shake vigorously. Double strain into a chilled collins glass. Add fresh ice in the collins glass and top with chilled ginger beer. Float 2-3 dashes of Angostura Bitters on top and garnish with a grilled pineapple wedge on rim of glass, and two Luxardo Cherries speared through a toothpick, and edible orchid placed on top hanging from the rim.
Stir in a mixing glass with ice; strain into a coupe glass; garnish with orange and lemon zest.
Shake without ice, add ice and shake again then fine strain into a chilled egg coupe. Garnish with a Sage leaf.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and the edible flower of your choice.

notes: *Spiced kuri squash purée:  Ingredients 1 kuri squash, cubed 1 cinnamon stick 1 tsp cardamom pods 1 tsp coriander seeds 1 tsp juniper 1 tsp black pepper 2 cloves 3 cups water .5 cup maple syrup  Instructions Cook everything in saucepan until squash is very soft. Strain through fine mesh sieve, refrigerate. Serve or use it to make the cocktail above.   http://www.washingtonpost.com/express/wp/2014/10/16/the-gin-joints-recipe-for-a-fall-75-cocktail-from-bartender-nicole-hassoun/
preparationEN: Shake, strain into coupe glass. Top with sparkling wine and a sprig of lemon balm.
Shake ingredients with ice in shaker and then double strain into a couple glass. Top with champagne and garnish with lemon and apple slice.
Stir with ice and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Mix together the alcoholic portions and top with Pineapple and Lime juice.
Pour a generous measure of The King's Ginger into a flute. Add chilled Champagne to taste.

Shake over ice and strain into a chilled cocktail coupe. Garnish with a dash of cinnamon.  *Pumpkin-Infused Glenrothes Vintage Reserve: Peel, clean and cut small 2x2 in. pieces of sugar pumpkin. Salt very lightly and roast for about 20 mins. at 250°F. Put into a sealed container with scotch and let rest for 2 days. Strain off the pumpkin and re-bottle. Keep refrigerated.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: *House-made Cranberry syrup:  -- 2 cups Fresh Cranberries -- 1 cup Sugar -- 1 cup Water -- 2 Bay Leaves -- .25 cup Pink Peppercorns -- Half Serrano Chile -- 4 Sprigs Fresh Rosemary  Add all ingredients to a pot and heat thoroughly. Simmer on low until cranberries cook down for 25 minutes. Strain and let cool.

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.
preparationEN: Stir, strain into an absinthe rinsed coupe. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.

notes: This is a Rob Roy variation.
preparationEN: Serve on the rocks. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.
Put ingredients in mixing glass. Stir. Strain into glass that has absinthe rinse. Add lemon zest.

notes: Photo credit: liquor.com
preparationEN: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into an old fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry and an orange slice or twist.

Combine all ingredients in mixing glass. Stir and strain into Nick & Nora cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon zest and yerba mate tea sachet.  *Bay Leaf Syrup: -- 16 oz Water -- 12 Bay Leaves -- 1.5 C White Sugar  Bring water to boil with bay leaves. Lower heat to medium and simmer 15-20 mins. Stir in white sugar until dissolved, without bringing to a boil again. Remove from heat, let cool at room temperature. Remove bay leaves and enjoy.  **Salt Tincture: -- .5 C Salt -- 1 C Water -- 2 C 100p Vodka  Stir salt with water and vodka. Stir until dissolved. Strain out extra salt, if any.

preparationDE: Glas mit Eis füllen. Gießen Sie den Iren und Disaronno ein. Bis zum Anschlag mit Preiselbeersaft füllen.Mit einer Scheibe Zitrone garnieren. Viel Spaß!
preparationEN: Fill glass with ice  Pour in The Irishman and Disaronno  Fill to the top with Cranberry Juice  Garnish with a slice of lemon…Enjoy!
preparationIT: Riempire il bicchiere con ghiaccio Versare The Irishman e Disaronno Riempire fino in cima con succo di mirtillo rosso Guarnire con una fetta di limone… Buon divertimento!

preparationEN: Serve over ice in a collins glass.
Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an iced up glass with brown sugar rim.
Add all ingredients over ice. Stir with a barspoon. Squeeze lemon wedges and add blackberries.

Heat cranberries, sugar, OJ and King's Ginger over medium heat. Place the peppercorns, allspice, cloves and cinnamon in a piece of cheesecloth with the end tied. Add to pot. Cook stirring often until cranberries soften about 25 to 30 min. Refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
Dry shake and then shake with hand cracked ice. Serve in a goblet with grated nutmeg.
Dry shake, then shake with ice. Double strain into flute or sour glass. Top with a Saison.  Zest orange over top and garnish with a star anise.
Add all ingredients into a punch bowl or pitcher and stir. Add lemon wheels and strawberries to garnish.
Build in a glass over ice. Add lemon wheels and strawberries. Finish with a splash of fresh lemon or top up with some sparkling wine. This drink can also be made in jugs or punch bowls.
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake furiously. Fine strain into chilled coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist.

notes: Featured on The Tales of the Cocktail 2016 Carousel Bar Menu
preparationEN: Place King's Ginger and orange bitters in a Champagne flute, and top with sparkling wine. No garnish.
Serve in a handled glass, hot or over ice. Garnish with lemon, cinnamon stick and fresh blackberries.
Simmer over low heat for 3 hours, double strain with fine sieve.
Serve in a tall glass over ice.
Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and double strain into a glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.
Build in ice-filled tall glass, garnish with a squeeze of lime.
Method:  Simmer on a gentle heat for 30 minutes and garnish with a cinnamon stick

In a mixing glass, add the first three ingredients over ice. Stir to chill. In a separate coupe glass, add .5 oz of Luxardo Fernet and swirl glass until it is fully coated with the Fernet. Strain chilled cocktail from mixing glass into the Fernet-rinsed coupe (discard excess fernet). Garnish by placing a Luxardo Cherry into the bottom of the glass.
Stir the ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice, strain and serve over ice into an old fashioned glass.

Rinse glass with absinthe. Add a Luxardo Cherry (covered in its juice) to a mixing glass with remaining ingredients. Stir until cold and slightly rose colored. Single strain, serve with cherry from mixing glass.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Combine the lime, elderflower, tincture and cherries into a shaker tin. Muddle the cherries and then add the Junipero Gin. Shake with ice. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.  *Chili Tincture: -- Chiles (Habaneros or Bird’s eye Chiles recommended) -- Grain Alcohol or Vodka  Fill a small jar with stemmed hot chili peppers and cover with grain alcohol or high-proof vodka. Let soak for 3 days; strain.

notes: Espresso coffee (preferably hot). Use chocolate syrup to stick cacao nibs on the rim of the glass.
preparationEN: Shake first three ingredients with ice.  Strain over ice cream into prepared glass.

preparationDE: Mit Eis schütteln und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
preparationEN: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.
preparationIT: Shakerare con ghiaccio e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail.

preparationDE: Zwei Limettenkeile in ein Ballonglas drücken und dann die Herznote, Bombay Sapphire und MARTINI Rosso Wermut hinzufügen, verrühren. Füllen Sie das Glas vollständig mit Eiswürfeln und rühren Sie es um, um es abzukühlen. Mit dem Fever-Tree Ginger Ale auffüllen und zum Mischen wieder leicht umrühren. Mit einer geöffneten Ingwerscheibe und einem Minzzweig garnieren.
preparationEN: 1) Squeeze two lime wedges into a balloon glass then add the cordial, Bombay Sapphire and MARTINI Rosso Vermouth, swirl to mix.    2) Fully fill the glass with cubed ice and stir to chill.    3) Top with Fever-Tree Ginger Ale and gently stir again to combine.    4) Garnish with a snapped ginger slice and an awoken mint sprig.
preparationIT: 1) Spremere gli spicchi di lime in un bicchiere a palloncino, quindi aggiungere la fetta di radice di zenzero, Liquore ai fiori di sambuco St-Germain, MARTINI Bianco e Zaffiro Bombay  2) Riempire completamente il bicchiere con cubetti di ghiaccio e mescolare per raffreddare.  3) Completare con Fever-Tree Ginger Ale e mescolare di nuovo delicatamente per amalgamare.  4) Guarnire con una fetta di zenzero spezzata e un rametto di menta risvegliato.

preparationEN: Combine all ingredients into a large punch bowl and add large ice cube/cubes. Garnish liberally with slice fruits.
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and stir for 15-20 seconds. Strain into a highball filled with fresh ice.
Fill up a stemmed wine glass with ice then pour the ingredients, stir and serve.
Dry shake all ingredients. Hard shake with ice. Double strain into small pilsner glass. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.

notes: Luxardo & Ca'Secco PR partnership Fall 2015
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in a sparkling wine glass.

Heat cider to 180°F. In a 5 oz cup pour the scotch and drambuie. Add the heated cider. Stir in the spiced butter. Top with 3 drops bitters.  For the garnish, add 2 small cocktail stirrers, hang cookie off of the stirrer so that it leans off of the side of the cup.  *Spiced Butter: -- 1 half Stick Butter -- 1 tbsp Pumpkin Pie Spice -- .5 tbsp Brown Sugar -- .5 tsp Cayenne Pepper  Soften butter, add spices and mix with a spoon until all ingredients are combined.  **Chrusciki Cookies: -- 1 c All-purpose Flour -- 3 Egg Yolks -- 3 tbsp Sour Cream -- 1 tsp Vanilla Extract -- 1 tbsp Dark Rum -- 1 pinch Salt  Using a mixer, incorporate egg yolks into sour cream, add vanilla and rum, kneed in all-purpose flower and salt to taste. Divide dough in half on a floured board and let rest for 20 min. Working with half the dough at a time, roll out to 1/8 in. thickness, cut into 2 in. wide strips, cut these strips on the diagonal at 4 in. intervals. Heat 2 in. of vegetable oil in a large deep skillet to 350°F. Make a slit in the center of each strip of dough. Pull one end through the slit to form a bow. Fry 6 Chrusciki at a time for 1 min. or less per side till golden brown. Drain on a paper towel and dust with confectioners sugar.
In a highball glass full of ice add No.3, King's Ginger and red vermouth. Top up with the lemonade and serve with a slice of ginger and a wedge of pink grapefruit.
In a punch bowl add ingredients per person.

notes: Junipero Gin 20th Anniversary Signature Cocktail
preparationEN: Mix all ingredients in a tin except for the walnut oil. Utilizing the throwing technique, throw the mixture from one vessel to another vessel until chilled to air out the ingredients. Coat coupe glass with walnut oil and pour the mixture. Garnish with a dehydrated orange.  *Oloroso & Moscatel Blend: -- 2 parts César Florido Moscatel Special -- 1 part Lustau Oloroso Sherry  Blend ingredients.
Combine all ingredients in a Collins glass and stir. Garnish with a slice of ginger and lemon wheel.
Add all the spirits in a shaker (best to use Hendricks gin) as well as the orange bitters and lemon juice. Strain into a Margarita glass, top with Prosecco.
preparationIT: Aggiungere tutti gli alcolici in uno shaker (meglio usare il gin Hendricks), gli arancioni e il succo di limone. Filtrare in un bicchiere Margarita, guarnire con Prosecco.

preparationEN: Stir over cubed/vintage ice, double strain into a small chilled martini glass. Garnish with a black olive on a pick.
Shake with ice and strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a toasted marshmallow
Stir, tastes great up or over a large ice cube with an orange twist.

Place all ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir until proper dilution. Strain over a large hand cut ice cube placed in a double rocks glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry on a pick.
Stir all ingredients over ice and strain into a footed rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.  *Equal parts lemon and celery bitters in a dasher bottle.
Dry shake, then shake with ice. Double strain over cubed ice.
Shake. Serve in small rocks glass with no ice. Grapefruit slice to garnish.
Muddle the lemon peel and bitters with the King’s Ginger to release the oils.  Add scotch, stir, and enjoy.
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sage leaf speared through two cocktail onions.

preparationEN: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir until cold and strain into a chilled coupe.
Add ingredients to a mixing glass except club soda. Shake over ice, strain over ice into a collins glass, top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon wedge and candied ginger on a pick.
Pour a generous measure of The King's Ginger into a flute. Add chilled Champagne to taste.
Serve neat or on the rocks.

Boil water in a tea kettle.   Squeeze lemon slice into the mug. Insert whole cloves into the lemon slice and drop it into the mug.
Pour brandy into a brandy snifter. Top with 2-3 drops of truffle tincture. Spray Pipe Tobacco Essence on wrist. Smell wrist, sip drink, and enjoy.
Pour King's Ginger into an ice-filled collins glass. Top off with Fever-Tree Ginger Ale. Add bitters, and squeeze lime over and serve.

Combine all ingredients, shake for 20 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a snifter. Garnish with shaved nutmeg.

Add to a large jar or other container with a lid, and add a 750-mL bottle of mezcal. Let stand for 5 days and strain before using.

preparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la buccia d'arancia) con ghiaccio e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail.Aggiungere la scorza d'arancia e servire.

preparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail. Guarnire con una ciliegia e una scorza di limone grattugiata.

preparationEN: Stir with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass over small ice cubes. Garnish with an orange twist.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
preparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.

preparationDE: Vampiros können in einem hohen Glas oder einem old fashioned Glas zubereitet werden. Der Barkeeper kann das Glas zuerst mit Koscher-Salz "umsäumen", indem er eine Schicht Koscher-Salz auf ein Schneidebrett legt, den Glasrand mit Limettensaft oder Wasser anfeuchtet und dann den umgedrehten Glasrand auf das Koscher-Salz legt, so dass das Salz am angefeuchteten Rand haftet. Der zweite Schritt ist, das halbe Glas mit Eis zu füllen und ein oder zwei Schaugläser mit hochwertigem Tequila hinzuzufügen. Im nächsten Schritt werden die Aromastoffe hinzugefügt. Dazu wird eine frische Limette in das Glas gepresst, einige Salzkörner hinzugefügt, zitrusartiges Natron, bis das Glas 4/5 voll ist, und dann würziges Viuda de Sanchez (oder Orangensaft, Limettensaft und pico de gallo) hinzugefügt. Der letzte Schritt ist, die Zutaten so zu rühren, dass die Aromen richtig vermischt werden.
preparationEN: Vampiros may be made in a tall glass or an old fashioned glass. Bartenders may first "rim" the glass with Kosher Salt, which is done by placing a layer of Kosher Salt on a chopping board, moistening the glass' rim with lime juice or water, and then placing the upside down glass rim onto the Kosher Salt, so that the salt sticks to the moistened rim. The second step is to fill half the glass with ice and add one or two shooter glasses full of high quality Tequila. The next stage is to add the flavouring elements. This is done by squeezing a fresh lime into the glass, adding a few grains of salt, adding citrus-flavoured soda pop, until the glass is 4/5 full, and then adding spicy Viuda de Sanchez (or orange juice, lime juice and pico de gallo). The final step is to stir the ingredients so that the flavours are properly blended.
preparationIT: I vampiri possono essere realizzati in un bicchiere alto o in un bicchiere vecchio stile.  I baristi possono prima "bordare" il bicchiere con il sale Kosher, che viene fatto mettendo uno strato di sale Kosher su un tagliere, inumidendo il bordo del bicchiere con succo di lime o acqua, quindi posizionando il bordo del vetro capovolto sul Kosher Sale, in modo che il sale si attacchi al bordo inumidito.  Il secondo passo è riempire metà del bicchiere di ghiaccio e aggiungere uno o due bicchieri da shot pieni di Tequila di alta qualità.  La fase successiva consiste nell'aggiungere gli elementi aromatizzanti.  Questo viene fatto spremendo un lime fresco nel bicchiere, aggiungendo qualche granello di sale, aggiungendo soda pop aromatizzata agli agrumi, fino a quando il bicchiere non è pieno per 4/5, quindi aggiungere succo d'arancia/succo di lime.  Il passaggio finale è mescolare gli ingredienti in modo che i sapori siano ben amalgamati.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein old-fashioned Glas über Eiswürfel abseihen und servieren.

preparationDE: Den Rum und Kirschlikör in ein old-fashioned Glas gießen, das fast mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist. Gut umrühren.

notes: Adapted from Francesco Lafranconi's recipe in the Luxardo cocktail book. He originally called for Agave Tequila Blanco-style, which we have replaced with Chinaco Blanco.
preparationEN: Place the mint and cucumber in a mixing glass and muddle briskly, then add sour mix and liquor. Shake with ice and double strain over ice into a stemmed glass.

Using a grater, slice 1 peel of grapefruit into a double old-fashioned glass, angling into the glass in order to get the expressed citrus. Then add Cinnamon-Clove Syrup and 3 large ice cubes.  Separately, in a large mixing glass full of ice, pour in Chinaco Anejo Tequila. Using a barspoon, stir for 28-33 rotations. Strain tequila into prepared glass. Add 4 drops of Bittermens Hellfire Bitters. Garnish and enjoy.  *Cinnamon-Clove Syrup:   -- 2 C Water -- 1 C Demarea Sugar -- 4-5 Cinnamon Sticks -- 7-9 Cloves  Combine Water and Demarea in a pot and bring to a simmer until the sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat. Add Cinnamon Sticks and Cloves and let steep. Leave at room temperature, overnight. Once cooled, strain into a squeeze bottle and refrigerate.

notes: Photo credit: chowhound.com
preparationEN: In a mixing glass, add all ingredients, then fill halfway with ice. Stir with a barspoon until chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Rub the lemon twist around the rim, drop it in the cocktail, and serve.
Serve in a rocks glass with an orange peel garnish and a Luxardo Cherry.

notes: This is a nice simple winter warmer that will hit the spot after a nice dinner. Vinterpäls is the Swedish word for winter jacket. When we first made this, we wanted to be up in the mountains at a ski resort in a hot tub...

notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.

preparationEN: Everyone’s favourite Paloma gets a delicious Indian makeover. Tequila reposado infused with “Timur Pepper” which has citrusy & grapefruit notes and is grown at the foothills of Himalaya. It also produces a slightly numbing and tingling sensation on your lip when consumed. We have also spiced up the fresh grapefruit juice with the warming spice blend from Himalaya. The combination of all these interesting elements has allowed us to elevate your Paloma sipping experience.
preparationIT: Il Paloma preferito da tutti riceve un delizioso restyling indiano. Tequila reposado infuso con "Timur Pepper" che ha note agrumate e di pompelmo ed è coltivato ai piedi dell'Himalaya. Produce anche una sensazione leggermente intorpidita e formicolio sul labbro quando viene consumato. Abbiamo anche aromatizzato il succo di pompelmo fresco con la calda miscela di spezie dell'Himalaya. La combinazione di tutti questi elementi interessanti ci ha permesso di elevare la tua esperienza di sorseggiare Paloma.

preparationEN: Salt rim. Combine all ingredients, shake with ice, and strain over fresh ice.⠀
preparationIT: Bordare il bicchiere con del sale. Unire tutti gli ingredienti, shakerare con ghiaccio e filtrare su ghiaccio fresco. ⠀

preparationEN: Spray the inside of the glass with absinthe, then sugar the external rim of the glass. Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into the glass.

Muddle a small handful of fresh mint leaves, ¾ oz simple syrup (equal parts sugar and water)  1 oz fresh lime juice. Add crushed ice to the glass to fill half way. pour in 2 oz of Pink Pigeon. Swizzle to incorporate ingredients and slowly add in the rest of the crushed ice.

Serve in a champagne flute up to 60% full and top with tonic water up to 80% full, garnish with a grapefruit twist.  *Ginger/Cardamom/Honey Syrup: Bring about 8 cups of water to a boil, once boiling turn off heat and add 2 cups of cardamom pods. Let sit for about 6 hours. Strain the pods out, add 1 qt (32 oz) of honey and stir until dissolved. For an added cardamom boost: place the cardamom pods with the cardamom/honey "tea" in a blender. Blend and press through a fine strainer so as to discard the solids but keep the flavor.

In a shaker mix all ingredients discarding the beer and dry shake vigorously to activate the egg whites. Add ice and shake for about 10 sec and double strain into 8 oz glass and top with beer. Garnish with a marigold flower.  *Spiced Apricot Syrup: -- Organic Earl Grey Tea -- Green Cardamom -- Juniper Berries
Shake with ice and strain into an ice-filled collins glass.

preparationDE: In ein gekühltes Cocktailglas schütteln und abseihen.
preparationEN: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass
preparationIT: Shakerare e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail ghiacciata

preparationEN: Served up with a lemon peel garnish.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in den Mixer geben - abdecken und bei mittlerer Geschwindigkeit schaumig schlagen, bis sie gut vermischt sind. In ein großes, 2 mittlere oder 3 kleine Gläser füllen und geniessen. Hinweis: Verwenden Sie viel Eis in diesem Gerät - ideal an heißen Tagen! Um Eis hinzuzufügen: Entfernen Sie die Mitte der Abdeckung, während der Mixer eingeschaltet ist - lassen Sie 3 oder 4 Eiswürfel fallen und mischen Sie sie, bis sie vollständig zerkleinert sind.
preparationEN: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up. Note: Use lots of ice in this one - great on hot days! To add ice: Remove the center of the cover while the blender is on - drop 3 or 4 ice cubs and blend until they're completely crushed.
preparationIT: Mettere tutti gli ingredienti nella caraffa del frullatore - coprire e montare a velocità media fino a quando non sono ben amalgamati.Nota: usa molto ghiaccio in questo - ottimo nelle giornate calde!Versare in un bicchiere alto, 2 medi o 3 piccoli e bere.Per aggiungere il ghiaccio: rimuovere il centro del coperchio mentre il frullatore è acceso - far cadere 3 o 4 cubetti di ghiaccio e frullare fino a quando non saranno completamente schiacciati.

preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass. Stir until 2 oz water is diluted. Strain into a sherry or nosing glass. Flame and discard an orange peel. Drink deeply.

Shaken slightly. Served over shaved ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnished with turmeric toasted coconut flakes.  *Toasted Coconut Infused Old Potrero -- 750ml Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey -- 2.5 oz Toasted Coconut  Combine all ingredients in a clean container and let sit for 8 hours. Strain through cheesecloth and then funnel back into your Old Potrero bottles. Keeps indefinitely.  **Turmeric Coconut Cream: -- 12 g Fresh Turmeric -- 1 c Water -- 1 c Honey -- 3 tsp Black Pepper -- 12 oz Coconut Milk  Grate fresh turmeric into 1 cup water. Bring to a boil, add 1 cup of honey and stir. Remove from heat and let the mix sit for 1:30 hours. Strain out turmeric and add 3 tsp. ground black pepper. Add 12 oz. coconut milk and stir. Place in an airtight container and keep in the fridge. Use within a week.
Mount all ingredients in a shaker tin. Add ice. Hard shake. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with orange twist.

notes: "Inspiration - let's just say I took creative license with a classic caipirinha recipe." - Lauren Sanchez
preparationEN: For a punch, combine Ypioca, lime, agave and Ancho Reyes together. Add fresh pineapple chunks, 3 thin sliced chiles (seeds included) and 1 star anise to garnish.
Build all into highball. Fill with ice. Top with soda water. Place pineapple leaf vertically in the glass.

preparationDE: Sambuca mit Root Bier mischen und umrühren. Füge Eis hinzu.
preparationEN: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice
preparationIT: Mescolare la sambuca con la birra alla radice e mescolare. Aggiungi il ghiaccio

preparationDE: Zusammen mischen und genießen.
preparationEN: Mix together and enjoy
preparationIT: Mescola e divertiti

preparationDE: Ohne Eis servieren. Zumindest sollte der Saft Raumtemperatur haben.
preparationEN: Serve without ice. At least the juice shold have room temperature.
preparationIT: Servire senza ghiaccio.  Almeno il succo dovrebbe avere la temperatura ambiente.

preparationDE: Füllen Sie das Glas mit Eis. Gießen Sie auf Chambord, dann füllen Sie mit Zima. Mischen und genießen.
preparationEN: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.
preparationIT: Riempi il bicchiere di ghiaccio.  Versare Chambord, quindi farcire con Zima.  Mescola e divertiti.

preparationDE: Gießen Sie Zima in einem Collins-Glas über Eis und geben Sie dann den Schuss Midori hinzu. Nicht rühren. Mit einer Kirsche garnieren.
preparationEN: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori. Don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.
preparationIT: Versare Zima in un bicchiere Collins sopra ghiaccio e poi versare lo shot di Midori.

preparationDE: Holen Sie sich ein Schnapsglas und geben Sie drei Schüsse des Schnapses hinein. Das Gleiche gilt für den Schwall Cola.
preparationEN: Get a shot glass and pour in three shots of the schnapps. Do the same with the Surge Cola. Then down it like Scheetz would.
preparationIT: Prendi un bicchierino e versa tre shot di grappa.

preparationDE: Das Glas mit Eiswürfeln füllen, Trinkhalm hinzufügen und in den Schnaps geben. Dann fügen Sie die Zutaten in der Reihenfolge hinzu und versuchen Sie, so viel wie möglich geschichtet zu halten (z.B. Chambord unten, dann Wodka, dann Soda oben).
preparationEN: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).
preparationIT: Riempi il bicchiere con il ghiaccio, aggiungi la cannuccia prima di aggiungere il liquore.

preparationDE: Kool-Aid nach Belieben mischen, dann Rum und Ammaretto hinzufügen. Gut schütteln, um den Zucker in der Kool-Aid aufzulösen.... kalt servieren.
preparationEN: Mix Kool-Aid to taste then add Rum and ammaretto. shake well to disolve the sugar in the Kool-Aid... serve cold
preparationIT: Mescolare Kool-Aid a piacere quindi aggiungere Rum e Amaretto.  Agitare bene per sciogliere lo zucchero nel Kool-Aid.  Servire freddo

preparationDE: 5 cl Cointreau auf Eis gießen, 2 cl frischen Zitronen- (oder Limetten-) Saft hinzufügen, leicht umrühren und schließlich Zitronen-/Limettenscheiben in ein Glas geben.
preparationEN: Pour 5cl of Cointreau on ice, add 2cl of fresh lemon (or lime) juice, stir gently, and finally add slices of lemon/lime in glass.
preparationIT: Versare 5 cl di Cointreau su ghiaccio, aggiungere 2 cl di succo di limone (o lime) fresco, mescolare delicatamente e infine aggiungere fettine di limone / lime in un bicchiere.

preparationDE: Keine spezifischen Mischungsanweisungen, nur alle Zutaten in ein Glas geben. Dazu passt Zitrone.
preparationEN: No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.
preparationIT: Nessuna istruzione di miscelazione specifica, versa ogni ingrediente in un bicchiere.

preparationDE: Mixen Sie mit hoher Geschwindigkeit für nicht mehr als 5 Sekunden. In ein Glas gießen, Eiswürfel zum Füllen hinzufügen, dann die Garnitur hinzufügen. *Donnas Mix: 3 zerdrückte Zimtstangen, 1 Tasse Zucker und 1 Tasse Wasser unter Rühren zum Kochen bringen, bis der Zucker gelöst ist. 2 Minuten köcheln lassen, dann vom Herd nehmen und mindestens 2 Stunden ruhen lassen, bevor man in eine saubere Glasflasche abseiht. Dann 1 Teil des Sirups und 2 Teile frischen Grapefruitsaft dazugeben.
preparationEN: Blend at high speed for no more than 5 seconds.    Pour into a glass, add ice cubes to fill, then add the garnish.    *Donn’s mix: Bring 3 crushed cinnamon sticks, 1 cup of sugar and 1 cup of water to a boil, stirring until the sugar is dissolved.    Simmer for 2 minutes, then remove from the heat and let sit for at least 2 hours before straining into a clean glass bottle.    Then add 1 part of the syrup and 2 parts of fresh grapefruit juice together.
preparationIT: Frullare ad alta velocità per non più di 5 secondi.  Versare in un bicchiere, aggiungere i cubetti di ghiaccio per farcire, quindi aggiungere la guarnizione.  * Preparato per Donn: porta a ebollizione 3 bastoncini di cannella tritati, 1 tazza di zucchero e 1 tazza di acqua, mescolando fino a quando lo zucchero si è sciolto.  Cuocere a fuoco lento per 2 minuti, quindi togliere dal fuoco e lasciare riposare per almeno 2 ore prima di filtrare in una bottiglia di vetro pulita.  Quindi aggiungere 1 parte di sciroppo e 2 parti di succo di pompelmo fresco insieme.

preparationDE: Wie ein Martini zubereiten. Mit einer grünen Olive garnieren.
preparationEN: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.
preparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti nel mixing glass con cubetti di ghiaccio.  Mescolare bene.  Filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail Martini ghiacciata.  Guarnisci con l'oliva.

preparationDE: Alles hinzufügen, schwarzen Kaffee einfüllen und mit Schlagsahne übergießen.
preparationEN: add all and pour black coffee and add whipped cream on top.
preparationIT: Aggiungere il tutto e versare il caffè nero e aggiungere sopra la panna montata.

preparationDE: Die Zutaten in einem mit Eiswürfeln gefüllten Mischgefäß schütteln. In ein Rocks Glas abseihen.
preparationEN: Shake ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice cubes. Strain into a rocks glass.
preparationIT: Shakerare gli ingredienti in una teglia piena di cubetti di ghiaccio.  Filtrare in un bicchiere alto.

preparationEN: Shake and serve up in a martini glass with lemon peel rind.
Shake and double strain into a coupe. Garnish with sage.  *Pear Syrup: -- Pear -- Sage -- White Pepper -- Star Anise

preparationDE: Shooter tröpfchenweise in ein Glas geben. Mit Bier füllen.
preparationEN: Drop shooter in glass. Fill with beer
preparationIT: Riempi un bicchierino di tequila.  Riempi un boccale di birra con la birra chiara.  Metti il bicchierino nella birra e bevi velocemente.

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten vermengen. Mischen, bis alles glatt ist. Auf Wunsch mit Schokoladenraspeln garnieren.
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients. Blend until smooth. Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired.
preparationIT: Combina tutti gli ingredienti.  Frulla fino a che è liscio.  Guarnire con scaglie di cioccolato se lo si desidera.

preparationDE: Mit Eis vermischen. In einem Weinglas servieren. Mit Karotte garnieren.
preparationEN: Blend with ice. Serve in a wine glass. Garnish with carrot.
preparationIT: Miscela con ghiaccio.  Servire in un bicchiere da vino.  Guarnire con una carota.

notes: Cocktail Inspiration: The inspiration was to use ingredients that were created or changed in that era. The 1880's saw Coca Cola born and the reformulation of Amer Picon along with the push for American Whiskies.  This cocktail was used at Tales of the Cocktail 2013.
preparationEN: Build over ice in Old Fashioned glass.
Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

preparationDE: Über das Eis geben, schütteln und eingiessen.
preparationEN: Add over ice,shake and pour.
preparationIT: Aggiungere gli ingredienti dopo aver versato un po’ di ghiaccio, agitare e versare.

preparationDE: Beide Zutaten in ein Schnapsglas geben.
preparationEN: Add both ingredients to shot glass, shoot, and get drunk quick
preparationIT: Aggiungi entrambi gli ingredienti al bicchierino, bevi e ubriacati velocemente

preparationDE: Füllen Sie ein 12 cl. Glas mit Eis und Alkohol. Füllen Sie 2/3 des Glases mit Cola und den Rest mit Süß-Sauer. Mit einem Schuss Bitter und Zitronenkeil garnieren.
preparationEN: Fill 14oz glass with ice and alcohol. Fill 2/3 glass with cola and remainder with sweet & sour. Top with dash of bitters and lemon wedge.
preparationIT: Riempi un bicchiere da almeno 400ml con ghiaccio e alcol. Riempire i restanti 2/3 di bicchiere di cola e il resto di bevanda sweet & sour. Completare con un pizzico di bitter e uno spicchio di limone.

preparationEN: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an iced up glass.
Combine all ingredients with ice, shake, strain into martini glass, top with prosecco, garnish with sage.

Pour No.3 into ice-filled collins glass. Top off with Fever-Tree Tonic Water to just below rim of the glass. Float .25 oz. of Maurin Quina on top of cocktail. Garnish with small spoonful of fresh pomegranate seeds.

preparationDE: In ein Glas geben... und ab in den Schädel.
preparationEN: put them them in a glass... and slam it to tha head.
preparationIT: mettetele in un bicchiere ... E buona fortuna!
Versa in un bicchiere tutti gli ingredienti. Agitare bene

preparationDE: Mische gleiche Mengen in ein Glas mit Eis.
preparationEN: Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.
preparationIT: Mescolare quantità uguali in un bicchiere con ghiaccio.

preparationDE: Glas mit zerstoßenem Eis füllen. Füge Wodka hinzu. Füge einen Spritzer Grand-Marnier hinzu. Füllen Sie mit o.j.
preparationEN: fill glass with crushed ice. Add vodka. Add a splash of grand-marnier. Fill with o.j.
preparationIT: Riempire un bicchiere con ghiaccio tritato.  Aggiungi la vodka.  Aggiungi un tocco di grand-Marnier.  Riempi di succo d'arancia

preparationEN: Stir gently and garnish with a lemon twist.

drinkName: 57 Chevy with a White License Plate
preparationDE: 1. Füllen Sie ein Rocks Glas mit Eis 2. Geben Sie weiße Creme de Kakao und Wodka hinzu. 3. Umrühren.
preparationEN: 1. Fill a rocks glass with ice 2.add white creme de cacao and vodka 3.stir
preparationIT: 1. Riempi un bicchiere di tipo highball con ghiaccio  2. Aggiungere la crema di cacao bianca e la vodka  3. mescolare

preparationDE: Gießen Sie 6 cl. Gin. Füge 12 cl. 7-up hinzu. Füge Zitronensaft für den Geschmack hinzu. Wenn Sie zu schwach sind, füllen Sie das Glas mit mehr 7-Up auf.
preparationEN: Pour 2 oz. gin. Add 4 oz. 7-up. Add Lemon Juice for flavor. If you are weak, top up glass with more 7-Up.
preparationIT: Versare 60ml di Gin.  Aggiungi 120ml di  7 Up/Sprite.  Aggiungi il succo di limone per insaporire.  Se sei debole, rabbocca il bicchiere con più 7-Up/Sprite.

preparationEN: Shake all ingredients in an iced-filled cocktail shaker. Strain into chilled martini glass or cocktail coupe.

preparationDE: Gießen Sie kaluha, dann Baileys, dann Frangelico nicht gekühlt und nicht geschichtet -- SERVE!!!!!!!!
preparationEN: pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!
preparationIT: Versa Kahlua, Baileys e poi Frangelico.

preparationEN: Fill a Collins glass with ice.  Pour in vodka, lime cordial, and cranberry juice.  Fill up with Sprite.  Garnish with a Lime wheel or some cranberries
preparationIT: Riempi un bicchiere Collins di ghiaccio.  Versare la vodka, lo sciroppo di lime e il succo di mirtillo rosso.  Riempi con Sprite.  Guarnire con una fetta di lime o dei mirtilli rossi

preparationDE: Alle Zutaten in einem Glasmischer vermengen. Abkühlen lassen und in das Cocktailglas abseihen. Mit Erdbeerscheiben garnieren.
preparationEN: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer. Chill and strain into Cocktail glass. Garnish with sliced strawberry.
preparationIT: Unisci tutti gli ingredienti in una planetaria.  Raffredda e versa in un bicchiere da cocktail.  Guarnire con la fragola a fette.
